name: The Bookkeeper
description: The Bookkeeper is a cozy simulation game about learning the craft and mindset of book restoration. Using touch controls developed for iPad, experience the satisfying, tactile nature of book restoration as you methodically deconstruct and repair books (through tasks such as cleaning the cover, washing the pages and hanging them to dry, and unbinding/rebinding the pages) for a wide variety of customers.

name: Oodee's Passion
description: Oodee's Passion is a coop crafting game set in North America during the last ice age. Oodee and his faithful spirit companion Doog have been ostracized from their tribe and find themselves in a strange land where nothing is at it seems. Players must explore, craft and solve puzzles in order to help Oodee & Doog earn their way back into the hearts of their tribe.

name: Cervus Blade
description: Cervus Blade is a 3rd person action adventure game set in a deer-worshiping desert world with challenging hardcore combat.

name: Headbonk
description:
Navigating life can be awkward. Where are you going? What is the point of all this? What’s that stuck to my head? Relax. headbonk is an existential runner game that perfectly answers none of these questions.
In headbonk your goal is to keep moving — even when the stuff of life gets in the way. That ‘stuff’ literally sticks to your head, making you an increasingly absurd vehicle to move forward. If all else fails, kick back and watch headbonk play itself.

name: Chiaroscuro
description: Explore a whimsical world of light and shadow, while the blinking between black and white blurs the edge of reality…

name: Chernobyl
description: Sin descripción

name: Worldship: A Board Game Edition
description: Worldship: A Board Game Edition is a role-playing area control board game about a group of children who are forced into competing against each other in a spaceship.

name: The Cleaner
description: The Cleaner is a 2D simulation game that immerses players in the challenges of game creation under extreme censorship policies. Players take on the role of lead designer, Lia, who must design her game while navigating team feedback and censorship regulations.

name: Defectum
description: Defectum is a virtual reality (VR) experience that seeks to express and give players a sense of the fear of failure by utilizing and visualizing my personal experiences and transforming them into a VR experience. Players are given the opportunity to take a “walk in my shoes” and view the world through an intimate lens—they will face feelings and emotions such as anxiety, unease, and a loss of hope and are encouraged to take their time to explore and experience the visuals that are presented to them.

name: A Game Called Paako
description: A Game Called Paako is a pixel-art 2D platformer metagame that tells the story of a game major grad student named Chaoran making his thesis game project A Game Called Paako.

name: Wild Thaw
description: Wild Thaw is a third-person platformer about a fireball facing down a mountain of ice.

name: Garden
description: Garden is a casual mobile game in which players plant multiple types of plants that generate sounds. Each plant generates a different sound, and by planting various plants, players can compose their own musical garden. The project is a harmonious blend of visual art and music.

name: Ghostwriter
description: Ghostwriter is a singleplayer typing game that pits your words-per-minute against poltergeists who have nothing better to do. Type whatever shows up on the monitor and meet your quota before the time limit. Encounter a variety of ghost types that will interfere in different ways. Buy upgrades and powerups to give yourself an advantage. Improve your words-per-minute and have fun while you are at it!

name: Where the Sea Meets the Sky
description: Where the Sea Meets the Sky is a narrative-driven puzzle game about death and grief. Players take on the role of Susu as she uncovers a hidden secret held by Grandma after the passing of Grandpa. Susu will help Grandma work through her grief and come to a different understanding of death, drawing from her perspective and memories as a little child.

name: Gradually Jojo ni
description: A game where you play as a runner who is rushing to the goal. As you constantly speed up towards your goals, you may wonder to yourself, ‘what am I missing along my path?’ Slow down by pressing the button and you may see something you didn’t realize was there. Enjoy the environment and have a rest with simple interactions. Remember, the goal will always be there, and you can take your time.

name: Tofu Tower
description: Meet Tofu Tower. A living breathing apartment building located on a quiet city block. Life changes, though, when a freeway begins being built, and Tofu Tower is standing right in its way. The player’s goal is to find a new home for Tofu Tower and its residents, and explore what it means to be uprooted from one’s home.

name: Healing Beat
description: In Healing Beat, you are challenged to listen and learn the music of the plant, and match your movement to the rhythm.

name: A Hero's Journey
description: The story of the prince and the dragon is a common RPG story type. In the real world, aren't we also in the process of hunting the dragon and then gradually realizing the operating rules of the world around us? Therefore, this game slightly adapts the story and aims to explore the relationship between life and the world, especially in the context of Chinese-style education.

name: Swingggggg
description: Swingggggg is a 2D neon arcade game where you play as a pendulum and swing through endless levels using a unique physics-based mechanic.

name: In the Nick of Tie-m
description: Join Nick in his getaway chase and escape the scene of the crime by stealthily making your way through the city back to his hideout. Traverse rooftops, sneak past searchlights, hurtle through windows into apartments, and climb up fire escapes in order to escape. Avoid making too much noise or standing in the light for too long because the police will detect you!

name: Starweave
description: Starweave is a narrative game that uses tactical RPG mechanics to tell an allegorical story about constricting roles within a cycle of oppression. Dramatic and bittersweet, you endeavor to make the world just a little bit kinder through your actions.

name: Killer Bunny
description: Killer Bunny is an action-based platformer where players will traverse wild lands as a bunny protagonist, hunting the wretched spiders and snakes that killed their parents. At the end of the game, the bunny will face “Daddy Snake” and “Mommy Spider” — the primordial beings responsible for all spider and snake spawn.

name: Last Broadcast
description: Last Broadcast is a 3D narrative game set in a small radio station at the end of the world. Players assume the role of D-Jay, a charismatic radio host who is giving their last show as the sun turns red and the world burns down.

name: Love Next Door
description: Have you ever looked at a door and thought, “Wow, I’d love to go on a date with that?” Well now you can, in Love Next Door! Swipe on a door you want to date and talk your way into their hearts! Don't worry about how unhinged they may be…

name: MOON: Metagalactic Observer - OmNipotent
description:
Welcome to MOON.

Extraterrestrial life has been detected, along with valuable resources. Gather Moonium Ores and MOON Artifacts, attack your opponent and defend yourself to ensure survival.

Caution: If you lose all your MOON Artifacts, you’re as good as dead.

Good luck, Player.

name: The Mountain Calls
description: The Mountain Calls is a 2D puzzle platformer where the player takes on the role of a Feng Shui priest who uses elements from nature to repair broken incantations, preventing a disaster from befalling the village.

name: Nomad
description: Dance with danger in this frantic shooter, utiilizing an arsenal of movement options, weaponry, and tactical abilities.

name: Shape
description: "Shape" is an exciting story game that challenges players with intriguing puzzles. You'll delve into the life of a triangle living in a world dominated by squares. As you explore the triangle's inner world and uncover its true identity, you'll piece together the mysteries of its past. Every shape you discover brings you one step closer to understanding the triangle's journey and the emotions of being cast out of the norm.

name: On the Fly!
description: On the Fly! is a cozy couch co-op party game where two players take on the roles of stage crew and attempt to ensure their production goes off without a hitch.

name: Radio Exurbia
description: Radio Exurbia is a driving game about music and discovery as you explore a surreal landscape of twisted suburbs and sentient muscle cars. Use your Reality-Modulating radio to swap between worlds as you experience the stability of suburbia and the sublime excitement of the unknown, all set to a high-octane original soundtrack. Turn the key, tune in and swap worlds.

name: Roots
description: Roots is a single-player, 3D narrative adventure that navigates the depths of fear and self-doubt.

name: Valiant: Or, Val's guide to having a broken vag
description: (val)iant is a single-player, browser-based narrative game about pelvic pain. Play as Val, a nonbinary college student struggling with their relationship to their body, as well as their relationship with sex. This game is fundamentally about how we as a society learn (or don't learn) about sex.

name: Chrono Trigger: Bugfix and Uncensoring Patch
description: This patch is geared towards fixing bugs and patching up script inconsistencies or censorship. The aim is to preserve the original translation while generally improving the game as a whole.

name: Little Duty 1
description: Little Duty is a Multiplayer Game , with simple game mode for now team death match and ffa death match , it is curently simple, because i wanted to try to make it like that , you don 't need to buy guns to make experience for unlocking guns , just lets get some fun each other that's all .

name: Pop Moto
description:
Pop Moto is a motorcycle competition machine, featuring with 32 inch LCD screen, displays 16: 9 high resolution graphic effect with realistic motion motorcycle and real streets themes.

This moto car machine appears in unique bright LED lighting design, stereoscopic sound system and includes five racing tracks.

In the racing game play, the player can light up speed from special powerful mode, such as missiles, mines, liquid nitrogen (for a boost) and shields.

name: Doctor Who: Dalek Break-Out
description: A Flash web game released as part of the 2007 Doctor Who Adventure Calendar. Help a Dalek escape by blowing up its output and avoid it exploding himself.

name: Adventure Ball 3D Balancer
description: 3D Balancer Ball - every level is different from another, good graphics and optimization, nice physics, more than 13+ obstacles, lot of skins for ball, explore the world, collect diamonds and buy whatever skin you want and lot of surprises.

name: Enderal
description:
Enderal is a total conversion for TES V: Skyrim: a game modification that is set in its own world with its own landscape, lore and story. It offers an immersive open world, all for the player to explore, overhauled skill systems and gameplay mechanics and a dark, psychological storyline with believable characters.

Enderal is free and can be played by anyone owning a legal copy of TES V: Skyrim. (No DLCs are necessary.) It is developed non-commercially by SureAI, the team behind the renowned Oblivion mod "Nehrim: At Fate´s Edge" (and various other projects).

name: Kaizo Mario Galaxy
description: A mod for Super Mario Galaxy that reworks all stars in the game to make them more difficult. Some changes include reduced coins and life mushrooms, frame perfect jumps and more star chips and silver stars.

name: Flipz
description: Flipz is a game where you collect small pieces of your favorite characters and cartoons and battle with other players to get the best and rarest ones.

name: Turma do Arrepio: Grand Prix
description: Come and participate in the most terrifying car competition with the characters from A Turma do Arrepio.

name: Paperquarium
description: Paperquarium is the result of magic and the desire of your doodly fishes becoming alive. It gives you the chance to take care of your own virtual, doodly fish pets, to see them grow and interact on real timescale!

name: Mundo SBT
description: Explore the Mundo SBT with other players and live an amazing and unique experience by choosing your style, making new friends, participating in exciting competitions, and decorating your house.

name: The Dawn is Inevitable
description: The Dawn is Inevitable is an interactive crime drama/neo-western novel inspired by classic RPG games. A mysterious stranger is forced to hide in a village called Rassvet. This place is isolated from the outside world for the whole winter and keeps many dark secrets.

name: Crafty Lands
description:
Create your own universe in blocks!
A game to explore different worlds and build anything you could ever imagine.

Along the way, you will meet characters, pets, construction tools, and you will even be able to fly between different scenarios!

name: Doctor Who: Doctor In A Dash
description: A Flash web game released on the Doctor Who website. The game was designed by Colin who won the BBC Blast design and create a Doctor Who game competition. Race the TARDIS against Daleks, Judoon and the Slitheen!

name: Hihou-den: Taiyou wo Motomeru Mono-tachi
description: Sin descripción

name: BrasFoot 2003
description: BrasFoot 2003 is the first iteration of the soccer management simulator focused on Brazilian teams where you can buy and view players from other teams at any time during the game, manually select players for each match, change the ticket prices of the game at any time, and much more.

name: Last Remains
description: Last Remains is a 50-player zombie battle royale game where survivors compete in a PvPvE world and take risks on their journey to the extraction point by searching buildings to find food, water, and digital collectible skins such as equipment and weapons.

name: Tomb of Friends
description: Tomb of Friends is a videogame in which you make lots of friends.

name: Hot Cocoa Magic!
description: "Hot Cocoa Magic!" is a kinetic visual novel about a socially anxious witch and the power of hot cocoa!

name: Ravenhaul
description:
Queen Isadora III needs a high performing avian delivery service, and you are the right one to make her happy!

Get birds, get patrons, get contracts - Work hard, peck hard, enjoy your hard earned kernels, that's how we roll in bird county.

name: The Empress of Mahjong
description: The Empress invites you to play! Immerse yourself in the amazingly beautiful locations of Asia and complete mahjong levels approved by the Empress herself!

name: HeliVR Simulator
description: Learn, hone and master all the instruments and controls of a real helicopter in virtual reality! Follow the tutorials to turn the aircraft on and off, learn to use ropes and flares and apply your knowledge in any given situation.

name: Hime's Blossom
description: Spring rain, sakura petals are slowly falling off... You can feel the sweet scent of flowers in the air. Each of the princesses is looking for her own special petal...

name: Dimensions
description: In the Multiverse everything is possible, so each level is another world, another universe, live this incredible adventure and at the same time go through the history of video games.

name: Celestia Ultimate
description: Collect, train, and battle with Champions in this RPG built on Unreal Engine 5.

name: Saints Row: The Heist & The Hazardous
description: When an obnoxious movie star double-crosses the Boss, the Saints take revenge with a swaggering, black-tie heist.

name: Return to Grace
description: A daring space archaeologist has just unearthed the ancient resting place of a long lost A.I. god known as Grace. Adventure with various fractured A.I. personalities as you uncover the great mystery of why she was shut down all those years ago.

name: After You: Level Escape
description: "After You: Level Escape" is a narrative game with puzzles, but it is not an easy game, here you will not have indicators or tutorials, nor can you save when you want. In "After You - Level Escape" you need to put all your attention and use paper and pencil to move forward, if you're looking for an easy game, this is not your game.

name: Pegafuerte el Terrible
description: You are a man with a mission: shoot all the aliens that are trying to take over the world and rescue your little town "the powerful candle" Side scrolling platform game, similar to "Metal Slug", single player, offline, many checkpoints and varied levels!

name: Anima Flux
description: Anima Flux is a couch co-op metroidvania with two genetically enhanced soldiers, special agents of a theocratic dictatorial regime. Fight your way through swarms of mutants through a desolate, dystopian space city and save humanity's last stronghold, if, of course, anyone is still alive

name: Hello Kitty Food Town
description: Welcome to Hello Kitty Food Town! Fulfill your restaurant dreams with Hello Kitty, Keroppi and all their friends! Challenge culinary standards with innovative recipes and keep customers satisfied with your fingerlicking good food!

name: Fake Future
description:
What will happen when AI gains self-awareness and surpasses humanity?
What choices will humans make when faced with the appearance of a new energy "Icey"?
Countless complex clues point towards an unexplored "pixel" space - the [Fake Future].
The “future” it depicts is hazy yet mysterious, just like the desolation after the destruction of Earth, craving rebirth and exploration. Whether you're a fan of cyber-pixel style or a sci-fi fanatic, you won't want to miss this retro-futuristic pixel simulation game. Come and join us now!

name: Aeroplanes
description:
Get your wings and fly to victory in this fun game of strategy.
Command your small army of 3 war planes in fights against your friends via GameCenter or against "Frank", the smart brain we put inside your device for single player mode.
They say "lose sight, lose fight"! Not in this case. Games are turn based and progress is always saved. You can face many enemies at once in multiple online games like a brave soldier would.
Two types of planes are waiting on the runway. Choose between small angry planes or big powerful ones.

name: The Sims 4: The Daring Lifestyle Bundle
description: Seek adventure - and adventurous fashion! - with this free bundle containing The Sims 4 Jungle Adventure Game Pack, The Sims 4 Luxury Party Stuff Pack, and The Sims 4 Fashion Street Kit.

name: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut Bundle
description: The ultimate edition of the groundbreaking role playing game. You’re a detective with a unique skill system at your disposal and a whole city block to carve your path across. Interrogate unforgettable characters, crack murders, or take bribes. Become a hero or an absolute disaster of a human being.

name: Quiz Thiz Croatia: Bronze Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Cubic Figures 2
description: Make up figures from shaped blocks!

name: Zenful Journey
description: Step into a world of serenity and tranquility with Zenful Journey, the ultimate walking simulator for those seeking a moment of calm in their day. This zen-themed game invites you to explore a beautiful forest at your own pace, ticking off items on your list as you go.

name: Arcade Archives: Mazinger Z
description:
"Mazinger Z" is a shooter released by Banpresto (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1994.
Take control of Mazinger Z, Great Mazinger, and Grendizer, and use shooting, punches, and super weapons to take on Dr. Hell's Underground Empire! Supports up to two players at once.

name: Super Kids Racing: Snow Edition
description:
Super Kids Racing: Snow Edition offers wide variety of challenges with many different types of vehicles to choose from. Players will love to complete these challenges with their friends in split-screen multiplayer mode.

Get ready for ultimate racing adventure with your friends and family.

name: Ever Maiden: Daraku no Sono no Otome-tachi
description: This story is about “Puellarium", a school isolated from the outside world by fog and thorns. Here strict discipline is always in effect, where the air always tense and time never disturbed. However, one morning a girl was found unconscious in front of the school gate. This gate is always closed and should only open on special occasions. The guards, on alert, asked her to name herself to which she replied "Alouette." At that moment, the bell of the clock tower, which was rusty and always silent, rang out. "When the bell of the clock tower rings, the end of this school will come soon."

name: Bakkaniya
description: Sin descripción

name: Jinki: Infinity
description: JINKI Infinity is an action-packed video game set in a futuristic world where players take on the role of a skilled pilot controlling a powerful mecha. With fast-paced gameplay and an immersive storyline, players will battle against a wide range of enemy mechas, each with their unique strengths and weaknesses.

name: Gronk Want Rock
description: You play as Gronk. Gronk likes to collect rocks, the best rocks are at the bottom of deep caverns. You have to bring Gronk's favorite rock up to his house by carefully throwing the rock onto flat platforms on the walls of the cavern.

name: Samsara
description: Enter a world thrown out of balance. Nature has separated into its three physical states with no hope of returning to harmony. It's up to you to restore the balance. Use your abilities over solid, liquid, and gas to traverse levels and solve puzzles in this 2D platformer.

name: Pogglewash
description: A 3D platformer in which you play as a robot on an alien planet cleaning up polluted goop while interacting with cute creatures named Pogglewonks.

name: SystemCrash92
description: Face the machines of the evil hacker in this action roguelite. Your avatar will assist you in battle as you improve your skills with items and level up to build a powerful strategy. An unforgettable adventure for survival fans!

name: Air Race
description: A very rare prototype game. This game ran on the same hardware as "The Last Starfighter" (1984). Unfortunately, this game also suffered the same fate as the "The Last Starfighter" (1984). It was never released due to high cost of the hardware preventing the game being sold to the market. If released, it would have been the first space-themed racing game utilizing flat-shaded 3-D Polygons.

name: Gun and Girl
description: Experience the combination of shooting and puzzle elements

name: Parallel Paths
description: Run, Jump, & Swing your way to the top. Beat the clock and collect Upgrades. Find your dimension before time runs out.

name: Angel Legion: Lil Lily - Purple
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Heartbeat Hospital: Love, Lies, and Betrayal
description: A visual novel where decisions matter. Love, lies, and betrayal await in this gripping interactive story. Multiple endings!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The House
description: The owner of a house gave a warm welcome to me who got lost. I fell asleep and woke up.

name: Apploval
description: New sensation! Real-time roguelike! Automatically generated random dungeon! The level is reset every time, so you can enjoy it again.

name: Kam Thunder
description: Kam Thunder is a 2D platformer action-adventure game. It is a fast-paced project with a hack and slash style that requires constant movement, and a shallow story that focuses more on gameplay and effects.

name: Retro Rocket Raiders
description: An old school fast action twin stick shmup, featuring more than 20 weapons that you can equip your ship with and 30 different enemies

name: Bratz: Flaunt Your Fashion - Girls Nite Out Fashion Pack
description: Expand Bratz Magazine by reporting on your recent travels with a world-renowned designer and rock new looks from the Girls Nite Out collection.

name: V Rising: Secrets of Gloomrot
description:
A FRESH CHAPTER ON YOUR VAMPIRE JOURNEY!
Behold new footage of the coming update, just one week away on May the 17th. For those of you who have missed it, here's a quick catch-up on some of the features you can expect to revamp your blood-sucking experience.

With this update comes multi-level castles, the new territory system, and sweeping improvements to building and decorating your lair! Finally, you have the tools to make a mighty citadel worthy of your power.

Vardoran has been reimagined! From beautiful new vistas that house terrifying and mystifying new threats to the cursed, choking mist that completely warps the Cursed Forest experience, you can discover the human-infested lands as if it's your first time again.

A massive new zone with two unique areas twisted in the pursuit of cruel science. Navigate polluted valleys and lightning-scorched highlands to face the mutated experiments and mechanical wonder spawned from the maddened imaginations of the Trancendum.

name: Harry Potter 3
description: Harry Potter 3 is a bootleg shoot 'em up game for the Game Boy Color based on Harry Potter & the Philosopher's Stone.

name: The Sych story
description: Sin descripción

name: Tunnel Vision
description: Sin descripción

name: 60 Seconds Santa Run
description: It's almost Christmas and Santa is very late this year! Make it to your toy factory before the time runs out!

name: Kuplinov: Nightmares of The Past
description: Sin descripción

name: Airwolf
description: A horizontally scrolling shoot'em up game.

name: Virtual BMO
description:
Turn your Game Boy or Analogue Pocket into Adventure Time's lovable walking handheld console with Virtual BMO!

Change Beemo's expression at will or browse his desktop to find all sorts of surprises.

name: Akazukin
description: An arcade shooter based off Red Riding Hood.

name: Skyland
description:
A simple strategy game, where you build flying castles and fight other players. Runs on a Gameboy Advance. Instructions included within the game!

Supported peripherals:

* Gameboy Player (Gamecube) rumble support

* Link cable multiplayer

* SRAM or Flash storage

name: BlindJump
description: Blind Jump is a simple action/adventure game, featuring procedurally generated level maps, collectible items, fluid animation, and meticulously designed color palettes. Evan Bowman started the project in late 2015 while in college, and resumed work on the code after a several year long hiatus, during which he was teaching himself oil painting. Originally developed for macOS, the game was rebuilt from scratch during the 2020 pandemic, with a new custom engine. Blind Jump now compiles for various other platforms, including Linux, Windows, Nintendo Gameboy Advance, and Sony PlayStation Portable.

name: Tim Climpy's Warfair
description: Indie Multiplayer FPS game in Early Access. Low Poly graphics, multiple gamemodes

name: DeathTrap
description: A RogueLike based Puzzler set in a randomly generated dungeon.

name: SnowDropRock
description: An action Match-3 puzzler taking place on a seesaw.

name: Rejection Thesis
description: For every action there must be an equal and opposite reaction. Jump and push away the world around you in this narrative platformer.

name: Fallen Fallen
description: "The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom, And the knowledge of the Holy One is understanding." - Proverbs 9:10

name: A Change of Heart: A Magical Girl Adventure
description:
June Mejos is a regular high school student by day... but at night, she's a Magical Girl! With her friends, she fights Nightmares that threaten to cloud our world using the magic of Dreams.

Today is a special day for June but her friends have forgotten and ditched her! She's always been there for them. June's had enough... if they can't remember a simple day, she doesn't need them anyway. She'll prove she's strong enough to fight by herself.

And yet... something is happening inside her.

name: GhostVac
description: Your own ghost-sucking electromechanical arcade machine at home!

name: Remote Bot
description:
Beholding the future is not the way the greats do. The greats don’t watch, they make! Seize your chance! Take control of a robot via ssh. Command your robot with a brand new command line interface and make them walk, climb, or maybe even make a cup of coffee!

Platformer games, annoying as never before.
Connect numbers together while diving deeper and deeper into the machinery called 0 = 0 = 0.

name: Suburban Basketball
description: Play as John Basketball, rising the ranks of Basketball City's social hierarchy and becoming boss.

name: Station-8
description: Explore a research station in this short platformer.

name: Indiepocalypse #5
description: Issue #5 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Editor-dle
description: A 5-letter word based guessing game based around video editing terms.

name: Mr. Run and Jump
description: Mr Run and Jump draws you in with precise level design, free-flowing gameplay, and formidable challenge. Silky controls encourage players to run, jump, dash, double jump, and roll to clear levels with style, making it a speedrunner’s dream. Collectibles hidden in tough-to-reach spots demand players use their wits as well as their dexterity. Dynamic Assistance options allow players to set the level of difficulty they want. No matter how you play, Mr Run and Jump offers engaging gameplay options to players of varying skill levels and approaches.

name: MurmAllmaus
description: MurmALLmaus is a point-and-click adventure about the Murmous Mouse and your crazy journey through space on the way to your mice. Accompany them on their way and click through spaceships, department stores and alleys, but be careful: it gets cringe!

name: Haunted Horror Stories: Gone With The Wind
description:
HHS: Gone With The Wind is a single player game with psx era aesthetics.
An authentic retro horror with music, fixed cameras, environment, graphics, filters, and gameplay faithful to its aesthetics.

name: Forbidden
description: Forbidden is a mystery and romance visual novel where the player has the opportunity to choose their own adventure. The player will have to choose a subject for their thesis: History, Mathematics or Literature. You'll unlock different scenes and illustrations with each characters, in addition to have the opportunity to create a bond, learn more about them and their own secrets. Maybe even fall for one of them? Or have a platonic and friendly relationship? The choice is yours!

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Ft. Minecraft
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario and the Rod of Seasons
description: Sin descripción

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Cheato's Challenges
description: Sin descripción

name: Xalabaias Adventure
description: A Super Mario World ROM hack inspired by the Brazilian YouTube channel Pai Troll.

name: Celeste.smc
description: A Super Mario World rom hack created to reproduce Celeste's mechanics.

name: Cartuchito World
description: A Super Mario World ROM hack based on the web show Cartuchito.

name: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour - Neil
description: A playable character which can be unlocked in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour by connecting to its Game Boy Advance counterpart.

name: Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour - Ella
description: A playable character which can be unlocked in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour by connecting to its Game Boy Advance counterpart.

name: Wrestle Bros
description: Step into the ring with Wrestle Bros, the ultimate 1v1 browser-based big show! Body-slam, clothesline, and suplex your bros and earn your way to victory! Whether you're playing solo or taking on a friend, locally or remotely, the action never stops!

name: Doctor Who: Cyber Assault
description: In Pete's World, after the destruction of the Cyber-Controller, a new Cyber-Leader appears and wages war against the Preachers, who are attempting to destroy the Cybus factories across the world, sending in soldiers to disable the emotional inhibitors.

name: Mojito the Cat: Premium Edition
description: Jump into action in this quirky puzzle game. Travel the world along with an adorable cat named Mojito (or one of his friends).

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers: Complete Edition
description: Just because others call you a loser, doesn't mean you are one. Make the journey to the 90s Moscow and experience an adventure about friendship and finding your true self.

name: Family Chess: Superb Edition
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Happy Edition
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Happy Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

name: Catgotchi: Virtual Pet - Deluxe Edition
description: Welcome to Catgotchi: Virtual Pet, the ultimate game for all cat lovers! Raise and care for your virtual pet. These adorable pixel-art cats are sure to steal your heart!

name: Brain Memory: Legendary Edition
description:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

Our brains are the most important tools of the XXI century. Do your child a favor, and give thema gift that will help them reach their full potential.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - GOTY Edition
description: Pull out weeds, plant new apple trees and gather the literal fruits of your labour. With time, you'll discover ways to make your life easier and explore this charming 2D world.

name: Amaze! Complete Bundle
description:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

name: Loud: RockStar Edition
description: Get ready to rock & roll with this bundle in a heartwarming music arcade rhythm game!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 06
description: Season 2 Episode 6: Crescent High School Friend Club! To make up for becoming a Loser again, Pizza Boy helps throw a housewarming party for Holden's new roommate.

name: Greed and Grind
description: Hello guys I am bringing you this time around a small cozy little game about greed and grinding!! If you played my prevous games you should know what to expect! If you didnt... This is a small Idle game where the character battles autommatically while everything you do is drink a coffee.

name: Butterflies
description: Butterflies is a video game about inline skating and graffiti. Apparently some people did that before, but they don't seem like they'll be doing it anymore.

name: Kortstrid
description: Kortstrid: a captivating TCG in a vast fantasy world. Battle with unique heroes, foes, and companions in strategic, ever-evolving gameplay. Dive into an enthralling adventure filled with camaraderie!

name: Star Defence
description: Star Defence is a unit-placement real-time tower defense game in which you can place any unit you like on a 2D free-form plane. All units in the game, including enemies, are composed of units you place. Place your units in a balance between enemies and allies to develop your civilization.

name: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels
description: Dear warriors of the Kingmaker Academy! Face your talented colleagues in challenging duels at our school's most important tournament! Improve your skills with each duel, become the king of warriors and rule the school. But beware, remember it's a roguelike! You dont want to be eliminated, do you?!

name: Galactic Conquest Battle Infinity
description: In the year 3200. The Ethernal ore used as fuel for spaceships was beginning to run out, a galactic war broke out for control of the Ethernal, the galactic emperor Erick V issued a challenge to achieve peace, "the faction that can produce the most Ethernal will control the entire galaxy".

name: War Tank Machine Battle Vehicle Simulator
description: War Tank Machine is an action-packed game that puts players in the driver's seat of a powerful military tank, ready to take on enemy forces on the battlefield. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, players will experience the adrenaline rush of warfare as they engage in explosive tank battles across different terrains and landscapes.

name: Move the Pin: Classic Logic Puzzle
description: Classic ball puzzle - color each ball, pull the pin and fill the glass with colored balls!

name: BlackJack Waifu Tour
description: Feel like in Las Vegas, gamble without spending money at our real blackjack!

name: Find the Pairs: Classic Memory Puzzle
description: The classic memory training puzzle for the whole family - find a matching pairs!

name: Dig Deep: Complete Edition
description:
Grab a shovel and let's get digging! Join the adventure, hire miners and dig for a treasure.
Shovel your way to success: go underground and dig for treasure like a mole on a mission. But don't worry, you won't get stuck in a hole - unless you forget to hire workers to boost your digging empire.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 8
description: A new pack featuring 10 arranged songs, navigators, and avatars from Touhou Project!

name: Dying Light: Definitive Edition & Call of Juarez: Gunslinger
description:
The ultimate Zombie and Wild West experiences are now in one bundle!
Includes Dying Light: Definitive Edition + Call of Juarez: Gunslinger!

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Special Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Tohou Spell Bubble: Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack Vol.2
description: Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack Vol.2 is a collection of popular arrangement tracks from the rhythm game including "What About Progress?", "Necrofantasia: Arr.Demetori" and more.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Deluxe Edition
description: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Overwatch 2: Hero Pack
description: Jumpstart Your Roster of Heroes and Dominate the Battlefield!

name: Cult of the Lamb: Cultist and Heretic Pack Bundle
description: A pack bundle for Cult of the Lamb that includes the Cultist + the Heretic packs!

name: Rainbow Runner
description: It's time to take a run on the rainbow of colors and fun!

name: Piczle Lines 2: Flora & Fauna
description:
"Flora & Fauna”adds the following puzzle packs to Puzzle Mode:
- Flora 20 puzzles
- Baby Animals 20 puzzles
- Safari 20 puzzles
- Venemous Critters 20 puzzles

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Castles And Palaces 4
description: Majestic buildings and architecture from different eras. Assemble puzzles and enjoy great pictures.

name: Underworld: The Shelter
description:
Through exploration of the cursed shelter, the human race has discovered powerful equipment, resources, and gene-altering data.
Your objective is to harvest these items of great human advancement and return to base safely.
Mankind has underestimated the number of monsters on it's quest for the cursed shelter.
A massive counterattack by the monsters has begun!
Stop the monster's attack that threatens the survival of mankind and stay alive to the end!

name: I Am Hero: AFK Teamfight
description: I Am Hero presents unique gameplay with the combination of idle RPG elements with the tactics of auto chess teamfight. Our AFK game lets you build a powerful team to auto fight on your behalf.

name: Defender of the Wood
description:
The realm is in peril! Nasty little Goblin-Things have been spotted massing in the forest. The King has assembled his best archers for training to prepare for the onslaught! Is it too little too late?

Test your skill! Find out what it takes to impress Lord Astirian and become... a Defender of the Wood. Take on the goblin horde and challenge your friends' hi-scores!
The King has also put out a grand bounty on the fearsome creatures. Make sure you upgrade your amor and weapons before taking the war to their dragon commander.

name: The World of Obert Skye
description: The World of Obert Skye is an adventure, puzzle solving game for current and future Obert Skye fans.

name: Ding Dong Delivery 2: Pizza
description: The retro 'Paperboy' is all grown up and has graduated to delivering hot slices of pizza around town. Take control of a huge variety of vehicles, from tanks to boats and all in between. Dodge traffic and deliver as much food as you possibly can!

name: Sweet Summer World Challenge
description: Sweet Summer characters would like to welcome you to the one of the most adventurous towns! All the fun and excitement starts here! Make your way to the top of the map with “S” grade in each level and beat the world record!

name: Airborne Bundle
description: Get Trailmakers alonside our biggest expansion to date: Trailmakers: Airborne

name: Let's Sing 2023: Eurovision Hits Song Pack
description:
12 points go to ... Let's Sing! Get into the Eurovision mood with these popular hits from past editions in the Eurovision Hits Song Pack:

- Loreen "Euphoria"
- Eleni Foureira "Fuego"
- Lena "Satellite"
- Conchita Wurst "Rise like a Phoenix"
- Duncan Laurence "Arcade"

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Railroads of Japan
description: Discover Japan by train thanks to “Railroads of Japan” from Content Creator Ryuichi Kaminogi. This Content Creator Pack adds authentic Japanese railroad scenery to Cities: Skylines with stations, trains, buses, and more!

name: Situation Tarfu
description: Situation Tarfu is a simple get to the top arcade game with multiple playable characters each with their own stats!

name: Zombiax Evil
description: Survive as long as possible against the zombie horde of Zombiax Evil ! Alone or in coop mode, play as an elite soldier, arm yourself to the teeth and try to rid the whole of humanity of zombie vermin ! Become a Legend of the Resistance !

name: 3D Puzzle: Last of City
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Brooklyn & Queens
description: Cities are ever-changing, and this Pack from Content Creator Prosper explores the neighborhoods of Brooklyn and Queens. “Brooklyn & Queens” is a set of medium-rise high-density residential buildings and props for decorating the facade and rooftops.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Rio de Janeiro
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Mexico City
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Haunted Legends: The Call of Despair - Collector's Edition
description: People in Nulver Town are turning into crystal and more appear on the streets each day! Can you find out who's behind these strange transformations and save the town before it's too late?

name: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: Industrial Evolution
description: Walk the path of history with “Industrial Evolution”, from Community Creator Samantha “Avanya” Woods. This Content Creator Pack includes a new set of growable buildings that span different eras of industrial building styles, from red brick walls to modern, sleek industrial complexes.

name: Broken Minds
description: Broken minds is a CASUAL TURN COMBAT RPG, with a rich lore, where you control a 13 year old boy, in a mission to overcome his trauma

name: Leo's Red Carpet Rampage
description: Sin descripción

name: The House 2
description: The sequel to The House. Explore a haunted house that nobody has entered for decades. The family who lived there before committed suicide, but nobody knows why.

name: Tikrace
description:
Parkour, cyberpunk, neon are what you get in the Tikrace. Run for your life and set new time records on various maps.
Tikrace brings unique and skill based movement to the table, highly inspired by classic FPS titles, set in a SCI-FI setting

name: The Elephant Collection
description: The Elephant Collection remasters ten of jmtb02’s classic blue elephant games into one mammoth-sized package! From puzzle platformers to rapid-fire arcade games, this collection of ten Armor Games classics is tied together by a new overarching metanarrative.

name: Dontforget Connected
description: Dontforget Connected is an online multiplayer Undertale/Deltarune fan-game with MMORPG-style gameplay. It features a new underground to explore, over 50 playable characters, new battle mechanics, and much more!

name: Classmates
description:
June goes over to her classmate, Ian's house, to hand him some study notes. Soon enough, she finds herself unable to leave...

Help June escape by solving puzzles, and hiding from her kidnapper.

name: Söldner: Secret Wars Remastered
description: Söldner! Enjoy third-person combat, make use of a fully destructible environment. Customize your character and start combat on the huge worldmap (6500*3500 km), selecting your gear from over 100 firearms. Get into battle the way you want by employing over 120 vehicles. Take your tour now!

name: Pac-Man Hammer
description: Whac-a-mole machines with 6 or 3 moles to hit, respectively. Only released in Brazil.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 6
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 10 art pieces to choose from, and 1000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: OA: Other Age
description:
You are the Princess of Zeiva Kingdom. In order to celebrate your 16th birthday, Green Mage Nitarou gives you a special machine that allows you to summon your dream guy.

Enter the world of Other Age, where Genetic Glow and Imaginary Realm characters collide. There are 10 obtainable characters to choose from, complete with various mini-games, events and endings.

name: Idiot Maiden
description:
Rana, a girl who had came back from a Halloween party, was abducted by three mysterious talking dolls who wanted to use her body for a ritual to summon the vampire prince.

Not wanting to be part of any of it, Rana runs out and locks the dolls in their own ritual room. Now she must find a way out of a spooky house!

name: Surf
description: Surf is a browser game developed by Microsoft that is shipped with the Microsoft Edge web browser. In the game, the player must control a surfer as they move across a body of water while also collecting power-ups and evading obstacles and a kraken. The game features three game modes (classic, time trial, and slalom), has character customization, and supports keyboard, mouse, touch and gamepad controls.

name: Mountain of Ape
description: This game was created using the engine "Cheetah-man 3 Tsukuuru" by the game development circle "AlphaSecretBase（あるふぁ～秘密基地）."

name: Rose From The Depths
description: A visual novel about the recovery of a woman traumatized by an abusive relationship.

name: Picture Poker
description: A standalone 1-4 player fangame of the Picture Poker minigame from New Super Mario Bros DS.

name: Hayaku! Island of Darkness
description: Explore a mysterious island full of dangers and uncover the secrets behind the anomalous creatures that inhabit it in this retro-style metroidvania.

name: Beatle Quest
description: A text adventure with a story based on several Beatles song lyrics.

name: Bimbo
description: A scrolling maze in which the goals of Bimbo is to eat ten carrots and run from black rabbits.

name: Harlem Blade II: Dark Angel
description: Our guy left his childhood girl and went to war against a monster after his father got killed in it. When he came back a year later, he was just in time to see his childhood girl taken away by the monster's army. He joined the resistance and started to find her. Within 30 days, he can help girls who will join him in the fight.

name: FPS1
description: A short game about using an explosive bolt gun. Pin enemies with the bolt gun, then when the time is right, explode them!

name: The World's Hardest Game HTML5
description: A remastered version of The World's Hardest Game made after the closure of Adobe Flash Player.

name: LGBT Flags Merge!
description: Merge LGBT flags together to make new ones. Will you find them all?

name: Level 22
description: Gary is an office worker who overslept after a drunken night out in town. Here's where it gets tricky, because this isn't the first time Gary's been late for work, and he could be fired if he's spotted arriving at his desk after everyone else yet again. So he’ll have to prove his smartness and slyness to make his way up the 22 floors standing between him and his office without being caught.

name: Nonogram Color
description: Discover the mystery of Nonogram Color! With its enhanced gameplay, it's easy to follow the game rules and become a Nonogram master. Explore Nonogram Color and discover a fresh take on this classic paper-and-pencil nonogram puzzle.

name: A Conscious Decision
description: You are a wisp of consciousness in Jane's mind. Uncover the details of her past, make choices in the present and play until you attain a happy future.

name: Vagrant.exe
description: There is strange feedback from this derelict office. Its wall full of faint echoes that whisper a sedated memory of normalcy. Articles artifacts and relics of slaves in white collars now lost to a stasis in time. There are other things to discover, if one is brave enough to see it through... you are the Vagrant.exe.

name: The Secret Life of Probes Prologue
description: Converse with the unlikely inhabitants of our galaxy. Use tools, applications, and learned information to discover your place in the cosmos.

name: Niatang
description: A short visual novel taking place in a cyberpunk setting affected by global warming, discussing the topic of waste management.

name: Alpha One
description: Arcade shooter developed in 1988 by Vision Electronics.

name: Indiepocalypse #6
description: Issue #6 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Sonic Fishing
description: Sonic Fishing is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. The only element from the Sonic the Hedgehog series present in the game are in the lures.

name: Enigmash
description: Sin descripción

name: Vext Edit
description: Sin descripción

name: Yunoia
description: Iris, a light spirit, tends to the color of her world with a prismatic mask. One day, darkness envelops the skies and it begins to vacuum away the colors of her beloved Eden. Set out on a journey together to restore this world by dispersing the iridescence that can be found within.

name: Mythical Agent
description: Mythical Agent: a thrilling SRPG set in Diyu, the realm of the dead. You are Agent Urassik, a secret agent who must lead Unit 7, an anti-terrorist squad against demonic forces. Spend time with your crew and every choice will shape your destiny and the fate of the underworld in this epic adventure!

name: Veriscape
description: Veriscape is a 2D side-scroller where the map tiles are generated using music

name: RC Plane
description:
Fly and RC Plane through a realistic country side scenario.
Realistic flight, and great looking 3D graphics will amuse every kind of player.
Fly through a Barn, a windmill and some mysterious spots sparse trough the scenario.

name: Neon Run!
description:
Neon Run is an fast-paced, intense infinite runner game with a cool 80s retro style and soundtrack.
Dodge and jump to avoid the hazards and fly as far as you can. Shields and time distortion pickups are scattered along the way.
Submit your high score to the world leaderboard! Can you compete with the best?

name: Shuffle and K.O.
description: In this game, your goal is simple : knock all of your opponent's circles/polygons out of arena ! You may play with computers or other players at the same device.

name: Thunder
description:
Thunder is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are running in the middle of a thunderstorm. Collect the stars that form when lightning strikes the ground to score points. But avoid getting hit by lightning. Reverse your direction by pressing a button or by hitting the sides of the screen.

The game is over when you get struck.

name: Tokidoki Frenzies
description: The world's cutest friends are here! Global collaboration with fashion icon tokidoki characters appearing in a puzzle game for the first time! Meet the popular tokidoki characters in-game now!

name: BeanKind by Ketnipz
description: Help Bean build a room and a team, and share love all over the world, just by tapping your screen!

name: Galaxy War: The New Colony
description:
Take more colonies to the victory of galaxy war. Take or lose them, it is your choice!
In the year 2123, explorers on the galaxy Jeus discovered the remains of an ancient spacefaring civilization. In the decades that followed, these mysterious artifacts revealed startling new technologies, enabling travel to the furthest start and to transform unimageable powerful weapons more than ever in entire human history. The basis for this incredible technology is a force that controlled the very fabric of space and time.
They called it the greatest discovery in human history. But... They didn’t even image Alian creature called ‘Alien Species’ which are gurdians of the civilization. They are coming to destroy ‘Human’ to protect their civilization. And more dangeorus creatures ‘Extraterrestrial’are waiting outer space!

name: Quantum Galaxy
description: For the first time, experience the never before seen innovation of the mobile on-rails genre as Quantum Galaxy gives you the ability to Transform your spaceship in real-time via the use of space Pods and Stations. Watch as your ship morphs before your eyes from a tiny spacecraft, to a formidable star-fighter, to a massive MINI-BOSS! All this, combined with a unique use of friendly AI Wingmen to aid you on your new action-packed journey through the Quantum Galaxy.

name: Crawl On One
description:
Put a block on the field. Match three blocks of the same color to remove.
Placed on the field the block. He move in directions until reaching an obstacle or a border. Match three or more block parts of the same color to remove them.

name: Danger Darrel: Airplane Rush
description:
"Danger Darrel" is here and needs your help to test his new airplanes in this fun 3D arcade action adventure game! He loves the thrill and pushing his beloved planes to their limits, flying through the narrowest paths and fulfilling his desire for adrenaline in a race against dropping fuel levels in a challenging canyon environment.
Fly as far as possible in the hostile and ever-changing endless canyon valley, confronted with dangerous obstacles you might not expect. Make sure to collect various items and that you do not run out of fuel as you manoeuvre through the valley and avoid scratches on you wings! Do you have what it takes to race to the top and become the master?
Your goal? Get as far as possible with the individual planes to become the master on the global leaderboards where you will race against your friends and compete against pilots, racers and aviation masterminds worldwide!

name: Virgo and the Sparklings Game
description: Every choices is in your hand! Which option is the best for Virgo? Which partner is the most compatible for her? Choose and live the life of Virgo from the popular webcomic series Virgo and The Sparklings!

name: Doodle Truck 2
description: Everyone’s favorite trucking series rolls back into the App Store! Day or night, rain or shine, real truckers are always ready to truck, so pick up your load and deliver the goods! Just remember to buckle up, because it’s gonna be one wild ride!

name: Succubus: Red Goddess
description: Sin descripción

name: Planet Commander: Space Action
description:
Take part in interplanetary war in the distant future, when space flight is commonplace. You control a battlecruiser in fights with other users in multiplayer team battles.
In Planet Commander, you are the captain of an interstellar spaceship. Your galactic fleet starts out with a small cruiser, but as your space base develops, you’ll get to control battleships and even supermassive space cruisers!
Start with a small spaceship, but as your base grows and develops, you’ll graduate to commanding huge battleships and superheavy spaceships. Battle in a galaxy on fire online with real opponents in the multiplayer Space Wars game mode, and develop your space fleet.

name: Food Street: Restaurant Game
description:
Welcome to Food Street, a free restaurant and cafe management world!
You are the Master Chef of your own cafe, bakery, diner or restaurant!
Build and decorate the kitchen and restaurant of your dreams in a stunning 3D world and start cooking with a huge selection of fresh ingredients. Build a bakery to bake tasty dishes from all around the world, make street food, or create a 5-star restaurant that meets everyone’s appetite!
Visit friends, trade items with other my restaurant owners around cafe world and play together in friendly online competitions!
Keep all the customers in food town happy as you bake, cook and do even more in Food Street, your restaurant story in cafe land!

name: Farmers 2050
description:
Droughts occur, mortgage payments come due, and farm chores never stop. Discover what it really takes to feed the world.
Now you can create and manage a sustainable farm of your very own. Tend to crops; raise animals; and craft goods to trade, sell and donate in your local community all the while managing the three pillars of sustainability -- environment, economic and social.

name: Eastpunk: Journey
description:
Eastpunk: Journey is an eastern fantasy RPG card game in which you will experience a fantastical story based on Journey to the West and embrace adventures in Grand Tang, a magnificent Eastern civilization in an industrialized world.
Thanks to the discovery of Mana, a new energy that allows humans to have power comparable with gods, the Kingdom of Grand Tang entered an unprecedented era of prosperity.
But everything has a price. As the manifestation of the dark side of this power breaks out and drives everything into madness, the seemingly thriving world starts to crumble.
In Eastpunk: Journey, you will play as the Seeker immune to Miasma journeying to the West to find salvation for a world that is losing control.

name: Wolf Souls
description: Dark and unforgiving world of Wolf Souls, a Souls-like RPG where you play as a strong woman battling challenging bosses with magic and a variety of weapons.

name: VR Party Pack
description: It's great for both small groups of close friends and large group of party people! VR Party Pack is a local multiplayer game designed for beginner to advanced virtual reality users. Only one VR headset required!

name: Kongming's Fiendish Maze
description: When you enter Kongming's fiendish maze you have 15 minutes to escape. Pick up a weapon to kill enemies. Find the health crate to restore your health. Use the mini map to guide you. Follow the clues to freedom. It's just you against the maze. Good luck!

name: VR Party Pack
description: VR Party Pack brings living room family fun to virtual reality. Play a classic game of hangman, or try and describe a object using only certain words. Every game supports four players, each connecting using our app, so grab yourself and three of your favourite (or not so) friends or family and have fun!

name: Final Project
description:
A single player mod with 10 large SP maps that will give you about 10 hours of gameplay.

A story of a modder making a mod sounds a little strange, but that’s what this mod is. However, you spend 95% of your time playing, so don’t worry it’s not just narration or a tutorial.

Play the scenarios you are given and see if you can make it into the sunset.

name: Just Jigsaws
description: Sin descripción

name: My Sushi Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Helicopter Escape 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Soulworker Urban Strategy
description:
Co-op simulation played strategically.
Fight with soul workers against endless lootings and destructions for survival in ruined cities.

name: Drill and Collect
description: Sin descripción

name: Apple Knight 2
description:
Become the Ultimate Hero!

Dive into intense hack-and-slash action as you battle through hordes of enemies in this action platformer! Explore treacherous dungeons, and unlock a vast arsenal of weapons, skins, abilities, and pets!

name: Beach Club Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: The Long Way
description: Sin descripción

name: Ancient Village 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Raid
description: Sin descripción

name: Beat Mp3
description: Sin descripción

name: Drag Battle
description: Sin descripción

name: Abyss
description: Abyss is an action-packed free-to-play fantasy adventure roleplaying game (ARPG) enriched with roguelike elements. Embark on a journey into an endless dungeon, seeking potent equipment while confronting formidable creatures fueled by the captivating essence of biopunk enchantments. Are you prepared to endure an expedition into the heart of the Abyss?

name: Traffic Tour Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: PlayPark StreetBallers
description: Sin descripción

name: Mafia Inc.
description: Sin descripción

name: Barro F22
description: Barro F22 is the new generation for the fast version of Barro, now with a new style of race tracks but, with the good old toy car/ go kart arcade style!

name: Barro GT
description: Barro GT is the new generation of Barro, now with a new style of race tracks but, with the good old toy car/ go kart arcade style!

name: Nothing Bad Ever Happens to Me
description:
Nothing Bad Ever Happens to me, is a short, 5 ~ 10min. story about a few girls who don't really get along.

Katrina, our heroine, is a popular girl who has had great luck in her life thus far. She's at the top of her class, her family is happy... she probably couldn't ask for a more perfect life!

One day, a few of her classmates suggest they walk home together. Might not be a bad idea to humor the lower-class.

What could go wrong?

name: Gekiatsu!! Pachige Tamashii Max Evangelion 7 x Seimei no Kodou
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Friday
description: A text based simulator of Wall Street.

name: Sexaginta Quattuordle
description: A daily word guessing game where players must guess 64 different hidden words. Each guess reveals information about the hidden words. Free play and historical replay modes are also available.

name: Tenet of the Spark
description: Tenet of the Spark is a linear story-driven third-person action and stealth game with an engrossing plot.

name: Detective Chirpums: Private Investigator
description:
They say the city's a roost for every bird.

Detective Chirpums is more than happy to disagree with that. Almost as much as he is downing a bottle of Grackle's Finest in one sitting.

He's the city's best detective. He's the city's only detective. Because someone had to.

And he's got a new case. It's his only chance at paying rent for the month. And not unlike too many of his cases, this one comes with a dame in sheep's clothing.”

name: Giselle
description:
"I tend to sit alone... and talk to myself, and in the emptiness of my room... I hear my thoughts."

Giselle is a short, creepy puzzle RPG maker game, where you play as a young girl, trying to leave her room without getting consumed by her own thoughts.

name: Hawken Reborn
description:
Return to the world of high-octane mech combat in Hawken Reborn. Construct your ultimate war machine and shoot your way through hordes of enemies to uncover the mysteries of Ilall in this brand-new Free-to-Play PVE mech game.

Hawken Reborn is a PvE first person shooter, whilst the original Hawken was an exclusively PvP experience. Pilots may not be going head-to-head in Hawken Reborn against each other, but they can expect just as much combat and high-octane mech fighting as you explore the new world of Illal.

name: Andromeda SS
description: Exciting Space Game! Mysterious Enemies Attack The Earth! Players' Beam-Cannon can be moved from side to side by the lever. Beams to destroy 'Andromeda-Ships' are fired by pressing the button. When all 'Andro-Ships' are destroyed, a new screen image of all ships will appear again. Bonus points shown at the bottom of the screen will be added to player's total points, as player resumes the game.

name: Project Bloom
description: A turn based RPG rogue-like. Gain the tactical advantage with the Time-based battle system. Recruit, train and lead your heroes against the treacherous foes awaiting in the Dream Realm

name: Ducenti-Quinquaginta-Sexordle
description: A daily word guessing game where players must guess 256 different hidden words. Each guess reveals information about the hidden words. Free play and historical replay modes are also available.

name: Isha no Mahou Toshoshitsu
description: Isha's Magical Library is an indie roguelike game in Japanese, published in 2023. It is free to play.

name: X-Sail
description: Sin descripción

name: Tricky Tracks 2010
description: Drive a four-wheel drive buggy over complicated, aerial tracks as quickly as possible while trying not to fall off. Includes a track editor.

name: Our Last Dayz
description: Our Last Dayz is an adventure game that will take you where you have never gone. Fight along side Vampires, Werewolves and Zombies to stop Lilith from her destructive plan. Save yourself, Save the city, Save the Child.

name: Vikings Hnefatafl: Kings of the Dark Age
description: In the late 8th century, Anglo-Saxon Britain faces a threat like none before: northmen from across the seas, also called Vikings. In Vikings Hnefatafl: Kings of the Dark Age, you will be leading either the Vikings or the Saxons into battle by means of turn-based strategy.

name: Dream Job: Delivery Simulator
description: Delivery simulator in pre-solar punk world.

name: Picket Line
description: Picket Line is a casual single-player tower defense game that tells the story of a factory strike in 20th century Europe. Players act as the Union by controlling the workers who form a picket line. The goal of the game is to block any potential workers who want to enter the factory to keep it working (popularly known as Scabs), and to hold the strike long enough until the factory gives up and accepts the Union's terms.

name: 98xx
description: The 98xx software was dug up with only a few working files remaining. You must navigate through each item and see what they do. Perhaps something might happen.

name: Demon Scrolls
description: Stop the Primagen before he can find the Demon Scrolls to usher in an Age of Darkness in this Single Player RPG

name: Clicks Of Courage
description: Clicks of Courage is an action RPG. You must guide your hero in a medieval fantasy world and destroy other factions to win the competition for domination.

name: Edemn: Cyborg Skeleton
description: A metallic cyborg designed to destroy everything in its path.

name: Agatha Christie: Murder on the Orient Express - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Agatha Christie: Murder on the Orient Express includes:
- The Game Original Soundtrack
- Detective Avatars (Hercule Poirot & Joanna Locke)
- The Art of: Murder on the Orient Express - HD Digital Artbook
- 3 HD Wallpapers

name: Wheelie Life
description: Welcome to Wheelie Life 2, the best online wheelie game yet. Enjoy the online mode, where you can create or join rooms to play with your friends and more players.

name: Thea 2: Rat Tales & More
description: The long-awaited DLC for Thea 2: The Shattering containing new stories, characters, classes, and pets.

name: Naval Action: Rotterdam
description: "Rotterdam" is a beautiful and heavily armed West Indiaman built for the Rotterdam chamber of the Geoctrooieerde Westindische Compagnie.

name: Byakuya Museum
description: “I should have...died...”Opened eyes again, he found himself in a bustling museum!Players need to take on the role of a raven specimen boy "Gregorio" to explore the Byakuya Museum. Your mission is to plumb the secrets of Time Town, uncover your own past, and escape from the museum.

name: Powerstar Golf: Rocky Ridge
description: This item expands your Powerstar Golf experience with a new course, a new character, new career events, and more!

name: Last Labyrinth: Lucidity Lost
description: An escape adventure game in which you work with "Katia," a girl who speaks a mysterious language, to escape from a hall where death traps are set.

name: Sight Blight
description: A small game about saving Elves from a horrible laser death.

name: Word Tracky
description:
Word Tracky is the game where you drag and swipe to hunt for the nine letter words. Set over a range of different animated environments, use powerups to help seek out all the words, including special cash and bonus words.
Relaxing and addictive, Word Tracky can also be played in a more fast paced way to achieve combos and high scores.

name: Space Dodger 2019: Arcade Wars
description:
Space Dodger 2019 - is a fun online space arcade game. It is a game perfect to kill time.
Well, cosmonaut, that's the future, you are now a lonely space explorer, all you have is your spaceship and skills to drive it. In the galaxy, you will meet aliens and you will be plunged in the battle of worlds. Dodge alien attacks and use their weapons against them!

name: Cuboid Stack
description: Place blocks and built a tower as high as you can!

name: Safari Chef
description:
Join our cooking chef all over the world and feed the animals! Help the chef with cooking food for the animals in this physics based game. Draw a line and drop the food on the right spot so the animals can get their favourite food.
Everyone can enjoy Safari Chef! Kids, adults and the whole family. If you like physics based games, food puzzles or cooking games, this game is for you! Help our chef and feed many animals around the world. Test your brain and help the animals get their favorite food.
Safari Chef is a game in which physics are important. Make sure to drop the food on the right spot! There are 90 different levels and each one of them is a fun puzzle the you’ll have to solve. Download for free one of the best cooking chef games with levels.

name: Powerstar Golf: Emperor's Garden
description: This item expands your Powerstar Golf experience with a new course, a new character, new career events, and more!

name: Midnight Cycle in Muxi Town
description: What kind of work is this? This is an experimental multi storyline game. The work tells a science fiction story about consciousness implantation and simulated biological experiments. The work consists of a mixture of 22 storylines, 3 types of reincarnation endings, and 1 main ending.

name: Norn9: Last Era - Limited Edition
description:
Fandisc for Norn9.
Limited Edition Includes:
15" x 25" Cloth Poster
Collectible Artbook
Set of 11 vinyl Hiyoko Stickers
3" Acrylic Keychain w/ chibi artwork
All in a collectible box

name: Remember to Remember
description: Remember to Remember is a Yume Nikki fangame by emrbt. You play as Pale, a boy with amnesia who is staying in a hospital.

name: Taito Milestones 2
description: On the heels of last year’s first Taito Milestones comes a new collection with more of Taito’s arcade classics.

name: Shape Shipper
description:
Welcome to shape shipper!

You have been tasked to construct items out of raw materials to be shipped off to customers! Try to keep up with the demand!

name: The Dark Pictures: Volume 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Apple Quest Monsters DX
description: Over 100 pages containing 85 lovingly crafted sprites and descriptions of monsters, a map, photos and more; all from a non existant RPG, inspired by my childhood love of reading strategy guides for games I never played.

name: Diablo IV: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Diablo IV is the next-gen action RPG experience with endless evil to slaughter, countless abilities to master, nightmarish Dungeons, and legendary loot.

This is only the beginning for Diablo IV, with new events, stories, seasons, rewards, and more looming on the horizon.

name: Diablo IV: Ultimate Edition
description: Endless demons to slaughter. Deep customization through Talents, Skill Points, Runes, and Legendary loot. Randomized dungeons contained in a dynamic open world. Survive and conquer darkness—or succumb to the shadows.

name: Doctor Who: Defeat Deffry
description: A Flash web game inspired by Doctor Who episode "School Reunion". Mr. Finch, the headmaster of Deffry Vale High School, asks you to break the alien Krillitane code after some logic and sequence tests.

name: Beep Boop
description: Play as Boop - the local courier driver. Help others get their packages safely to their establishments. Get money, buy flowers for your wife and maybe even buy a new car!

name: Curious Fishing
description: Sin descripción

name: Atomic Survivors
description: Atomic Survivors is an arena shooter with minimalistic gameplay and simplistic roguelike elements in which you have to fend off many waves of opponents. Collect Resin every run to buy one of several upgrades of your choice. And remember: for best results, choose wisely.

name: Surviving Soldier
description: Surviving Soldier - Platform runner with arcade elements. In this game, you need to help a soldier get to his own. The enemy does not sleep and conducts pinpoint shelling. Try not to hit your head, it will be fatal to you.

name: Married Girls' Night School
description: Becoming friends with married girls at a night school!? This is a mature adolescent novel about night time, school, and married girls!

name: Salary Man Mario
description: Mario’s just an everyday salary man, and now’s the time to prove yourself! Bowser has kidnapped your boss, and it’s up to you to rescue him! Do a good enough job, and you might just get a bonus for your trouble!

name: Wheat Fairy of Daya
description: Play as a wheat fairy, using the magical energy of the wheat field to dispel the threats of wheat! Combine different skills to make your own attack style! And let the wheat grow and harvest smoothly under the test of other nature fairies.

name: Western War
description: Western War - This is a 2D rail shooter with a top-down view of shooting enemies, with each level their number and speed increase, and you must use two revolvers to shoot enemies and reload the revolvers in time so as not to end up in the pit for the dead.

name: Long
description: Will you be able to get out of this long corridor? A long road with death on the prowl will stand between you and the exit. There is no other way, you are already inside.

name: Gathering Our Childhoods
description: The story of the game is about the player traveling back to the childhood campus. Players are required to complete all kinds of tasks, so as to collect the memory points to be able to return to the original world. Let's have a childhood journey together!

name: Eclipse Survivors
description: Experience the ultimate challenge in Eclipse Survivors, a bullet-hell / area shooter game featuring epic bosses inspired by classic 16-bit titles. Collect XP gems, master unique skills, and dodge countless enemy bullets as you face off against hordes of foes. Will you survive the eclipse?

name: Cute Puzzles!!!
description: Cute Puzzles!!! The game is very simple, you have to collect a picture, which consists of 20 elements.

name: The King of Fighters XV: Character "Sylvie Paula Paula"
description: This character is also bundled together in the available The King of Fighters XV Fighter Pass DLC character set.

name: Tony Hawk's Proving Ground
description:
The Nintendo DS version of Tony Hawk's Proving Ground was developed by Vicarious Visions. Its gameplay is very similar to the DS version of Tony Hawk’s American Sk8land. In the game's story mode, your objective is to progress as a career or hardcore skater. This entails completing various goals across three different categories: Career, Hardcore, and Neutral. By accomplishing these goals, you earn money that can be used to enhance your skate park. As you tackle enough challenges, professional skaters make appearances, and their challenges, when completed, allow you to acquire new skate park elements and advance to the next level.

This version of the game incorporates certain gameplay features from the console versions. Aggro kicking enables the player to gain speed more rapidly. Some missions involve executing Gesture Tricks, where you replicate motions on the touch screen, reminiscent of the Nail The Trick feature in the console versions. Most missions are completed at different difficulty levels, and challenges are scattered throughout the levels, both of which were introduced in Project 8. However, this version lacks the open world design. The downtown areas of Philly and Baltimore are absent, and the Air & Space Museum incorporates elements of the National Mall. Additionally, several levels have been redesigned to suit the hardware, with Lansdowne being the most notable example. The Xbox 360 and PS3 versions' skate lounge is replaced by a sizable customizable skatepark.

name: Heisei Tensai Bakabon
description: Heisei Tensai Bakabon is an Action game based on a manga named Tensai Bakabon.

name: Heisei Tensai Bakabon Minna de Family Resturant ni Iku no da!
description: An educational game based on manga Tensai Bakabon.

name: Finished!
description: A digital implementation of the Friedemann Friese solitaire game.

name: Apartament 1406
description: Apartment 1406 is a horror game that will give you an amazing experience in a dark horror world. The game introduces psychological elements such as ever-changing environments and two alternate worlds, which makes it very interesting and mysterious. The player must face various unknown phenomena, ghosts and demons, which combined with the dark and gloomy atmosphere will give you great emotions.

name: The Closure
description:
The Closure (also known as Half-Life 2 Episode 3: The Closure) is a Mod for Half-Life 2, developed and published by SPY Interactive. This Mod acts as an unofficial sequel to Half-Life 2: Episode Two, starting after the death of Eli Vance.

The Mod received negative feedback due to the gameplay and design having very little to do with Half-Life and its extensive use of cutscenes.

name: Robot Dir
