description: Little Robot DIR had been on standby for years when a loving family of hedgehogs adopted him, but now his family has been captured and he needs your help to rescue them!

name: Silfade Gensoutan
description: Set in a fictional world named Silfade, from a long, long time ago. The protagonist was incarnate of Rikureru, a goddess-like figure, by means of gathering a spirit from the Sea of Perception, when she witnessed a coming disaster which will wreak havoc upon many lives. Upon incarnation, the protagonist is asked by Rikureru to prevent the disaster, which should occur after fifteen days.

name: Architecture Zeitgeist
description: Architecture Zeitgeist is a project that aims to popularize and make architecture education accessible. The game consists of 3D tours where the player will be able to visit and interact in real time with iconic architecture projects.

name: Paris-Marseille Racing
description:
Take control of your DeLorian, police car, Mini or Beetle and race through some of France's most famous (and busiest) roads and cities. With tournament, time attack and single race modes, the game allows you to race within three classes, in each of which you must place first. Your reward is cash to upgrade the numerous cars available with enhanced engines, tires and even a nitro boost.

Paris-Marseille is France's entry in Davilex's "Racer" series, alongside Autobahn Raser II in Germany, A2 Racer in Holland and London Racer in the UK.

name: Paris-Marseille Racing II
description:
Almost two years after the first Paris-Marseille Racing, Davilex Games decided to continue the story and make a series.

In this follow-up, the player can choose between six drivers (one female) with unique driving skills, and two game modes, one or two players. In the single player mode, you will have to choose between the three classic sub-modes : tournament, time attack and single race. New with this release are the two 2-players modes : Duel and Driver Vs Police. In the Duel mode, race head to head against a friend. In the Driver Vs Police mode, one choose to play a police man, the other must try to drive as fast as possible to escape.

The game also features three skill levels, repairing and fine-tuning options in the tournament mode, and of course new and enhanced graphics to race through France and its famous cities such as Marseilles, Paris or Lyon. Three bonus races can also be played in London, Edinburgh or Las Vegas!

name: Puyo Puyo
description:
Puyo Puyo is Game Gear port of Puyo Puyo. It includes an additional quest mode.

This port only released in Japan but contains a secret English localization with the title Puzlow Kids. This version appears whenever the game cartridge is used in a North American or European system.

name: Kimono Cats
description: Kimono Cats is a charming, easy to play game for all ages. Select your main-character cat and a companion-cat, and walk through a Japanese "matsuri" Festival, making your companion happy. Throw darts at moving bubbles to give your companion a gift from a stall, play a mini-game, or encounter characters. Earn coins, to progress along the road to new areas that have new things to discover. Coins also allow you to purchase houses, shops, and decorative objects to design and build your own unique village. You can take care of your village and visit other players' villages, earning bonus coins, leaving gifts, messages, and stamps in their guest books. Play online or offline. Kimono Cats is designed to help you smile a bit more every day.

name: Bomber
description:
A variety of the game Blitz, an earlier VIC-2 game which itself was an clone of Atari's arcade game Canyon Bomber. Gameplay has the player drop bombs over a city to clear an area that you can land.

Originally released as 'Bomb Buenos Aires', the game's theme was developed early in Jeff Minter's career, "intended as a tongue in cheek" response to the then ongoing Falkland Island, where buildings with small Argentinian flag's and the "Rule Britannia" play if the plane landed successfully. Written complaints and negative press would lead to the game quickly reissued and amended into "Bomber" or "City Bomb" as it's know today.

Bomber was one of the earliest games developed by Minter under Llamasoft.

name: Cube
description: A short sokoban puzzle game on the theme of dice.

name: Angler King
description: Angling fishing game released by Namco in 1999.

name: Comet Culling
description:
Comet Culling is a retro inspired, pixel art farming simulator set in space.

Join PR1NC3, a little helper android, as they travel through space in a plant-powered ship. Their battery is running low and the only way to charge it is to stop on a deserted planet and farm their fuel.

Discover alien species of plants, talk to a mysterious merchant that decided to stop by, read the logs saved on the ship and reveal what happened to PR1NC3 and their crew!

name: Mortified
description: Mortified is multiplayer horror co-op game playing 1-8 players find all the objects to make disappear the creature that wants to kill everything it sees ! Weclome to the hell .

name: Rustling Leaves
description: A digital implementation of the 2020 roll-and-write board game designed by Paolo Mori.

name: Hypersomnia
description:
Hypersomnia is a fast-paced online shooter released as free software, aspiring to become an MMO with elements of RPG.

Set in a hypothetical afterlife reality, it shall provide joy through altruistic behaviours, fierce fights, fulfillment of elaborate social roles or sowing panic as a traitor to benevolent ones.

Declare allegiance to one of the three factions whose apple of discord is a disparity between prevailing notions of moral excellence. Metropolis. Atlantis. Resistance.

name: Lotion Samurai for Nintendo Switch
description:
LotionSamurai for Nintendo Switch" is a remake of all stages of "Lotion Samurai" and "Shin Lotion Samurai" currently available on Steam and ported to Nintendo Switch.
The main character is Nobunaga Oda, whose entire body is overflowing with lubricant.
The main content is Time Attack.

name: Rhythm Lust Girl 2
description: Rhythm Lust Girl 2 is a casual puzzle game. There are 24 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Carry Onward
description: Carry Onward is a narrative gameplay short that follows a grieving man as he packs up his home. Immerse yourself in his thoughts and emotions by interacting with items, which shape his internal state. Experience the transformative power of memories and the hope that arises from embracing change.

name: Stalk the Giant
description: Deliver pizza to clowns to support your caffeine addiction and stalk the giant!

name: Hidden
description: A PlayJam 3 entry about homelessness.

name: Dog Knowse Chapter 1: The Dame
description: A short cyberpunk noir tale created for Playjam3.

name: Digscovery
description: An artifact is just out of sight... why not dig for it!

name: Mornin' Joe!
description: A café memory puzzle game for the Playdate!

name: Vicious Red
description: Vicious Red is a third person survival-horror game that stays true to the genre's best traditions. Set in an alternate universe of the recent past, the game takes place on a space station overrun by a terrifying virus. Players must fight for their lives as they face off against unimaginable horrors.

name: Humanoid Huntress
description: Humanoid Huntress is a top-down shooter Built in a tropical wasteland With 2.5D and 3D graphics mixed from a bird eye view. You can interact with NPCs through dialogue or shoot them down with special weapons. Explore your surroundings as you shoot your way through androids and monsters.

name: Blue Epic
description: Blue Epic is an ocean survival game where players can play marine creatures to survive; Complete control system included in the game

name: On the Brink
description: Manipulate the gravity of galaxies to traverse the universe, solve puzzles, reignite constellations, and uncover the mysteries of Project: Almagest to find your way home.

name: Caved-in
description: Welcome to Caved-in, a crazy, cute, and colorful parallel universe full of exploration and combat. Interact with cute and funny NPC's that will help you in your effort to escape the caverns of Quarry-135.

name: Astro Engineers
description: Astro Engineers is a co-op puzzle game for both virtual reality and desktop where you have to solve puzzles, work together and explore to complete different missions.

name: Gundroid
description: Earth is in danger in this classic Run N' Gun action spectacle inspired by the glory days of gaming from the late 80s and 90s! Take control of G.U.N.N.R and and battle your way through hordes of enemies and boss fights accompanied by a rocking soundtrack.

name: Search All: UFO
description: Is a hidden object game in which you have to find all the flying saucers in a large area. The flying saucers will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places.

name: Holy Journey of Salvation
description: Holy Journey of Salvation is a cinematic Immersive Sim FPS. As the Spirit Ascender, you must embark on a Holy Journey to ascend in the Holy Chamber! In this Post Apocalypse setting, your tribe has deep understanding of Chemistry... but did they get it right in all the wrong ways?

name: Whale Rock: All Games Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Vagrus: The Riven Realms - Sunfire and Moonshadow
description: Vagrus's first expansion offers a new, vast region to explore complete with a swathe of new settlements, new enemies to conquer, new stories to be a part of, a large cast of characters, and new quests to complete through which the vagrus may make their mark on Xeryn.

name: Whale Rock Games: Immersive Puzzles Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Stryke
description: The future is bleak, its Universe hostile, and not your friend. Mercilessly Tactical, Turn-Based Base-Building Strategy. Pick one of four Factions and develop a battleplan against or with players around the Globe, in a fight against a relentless rogue AI. There is not much Time.

name: Spooples
description: Survive flying through the depths of the Underworld as Spooples the Ghost! Jump through gaps found inside walls of flesh to increase your score. Use bullets to kill Demon Dogs!

name: Missile City AeroLeague
description: Missile City AeroLeague is a little like Street Fighter and a lot like Windjammers. Now with 40% more Sports Magick!

name: ShellShot Arena
description: ShellShot Arena is a fast-paced, top-down, online multiplayer game from the 'ShellShock Live' universe. Master a massive arsenal of upgradable weapons to be the last tank standing in Team, Free-For-All, and Battle Royale matches.

name: Glass Masquerade 3: Honeylines
description: Get ready for the Glass Masquerade sequel! With brand new textured glass pieces, immerse yourself in the beautiful world of painted glass art. Assemble jigsaw puzzles inspired by different cultures and themes with new play modes and various fragments cuts.

name: The Mighty Claw
description: Attach your titular Mighty Claw grappling hook to countless targets, including walls, ceilings, chronically bored pet elephants or gigantic guinea pigs that stretch by their butt! Explore a colorful 2D cartoon world, feel creative with your hook and get ready to swing, spin, grab and throw!

name: Tiling Towers
description: Tiling Towers is a Tower Defense game, where you expand a predetermined path and survive waves of increasingly stronger enemies and bosses. Choose from 3 randomly generated cards every few waves to unlock new towers and bonuses. Can you protect the Crimson Crystal from destruction?

name: Enypnion Redreamed
description: Enter a surreal adventure that delves deep into the subconscious mind of a young boy. Guided by a dream spirit, solve puzzles and explore a realm of eerie wonder, as you find your way back into the waking world. An illusory adventure redreamed!

name: Liberation
description: Fight back against the evil Galactic Federation! It'll be good for humanity and probably OK for you.

name: Home Sweet Home: Online
description: Welcome to Niwarn in its fullest form, from the creators of the Home Sweet Home series, ready for you to feel what it's like to be a thrilling visitor. Experience the clash between the two great forces in Niwarn as both the prey and predator simultaneously.

name: War to the Core
description: War to the Core is a tactical multiplayer war game where fleets of motherships battle for global domination.

name: The Doll
description: Lucy bought an exquisite large doll at a low price. While she combs its hair and chats with it, Little does she know that her nightmare is about to begin...

name: Duck's Despair
description: Embark on a brutally hard platforming journey as a desperate Duck who cannot fly. Will you make the pain your friend or give up on your dreams ?

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Ultimate Edition
description:
Get a lifetime benefit from a single purchase!
Unlock all characters including future legends and battle pass!
Get exclusive access to a special lounge shop!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Deluxe Edition
description:
Get a lifetime benefit from a single purchase!
Unlock all characters including future legends!
Get exclusive game buff forever!

name: Big Sword Hero
description: A platform fighting game with 4-player local, a party game that guarantees the mix between fun and epic battles with tense disputes. Simple mechanics and with varied maps and modes, each dispute is always unique.

name: Capt Crabs a Slimy Adventure
description: Capt Crabs, the pirate crab, was out with his crew searching for treasure on a mysterious island when suddenly his ship was taken by some mischievous slimes! Now he's on a mission to retrieve his ship and treasure and get back to the pirate life he loves!

name: Path of Disdain
description: Witness the unfolding of a dark fantasy tale of meeting your "Heroes". When your words fall onto deaf ears...maybe its time to make the ultimate sacrifice for the greater good.

name: After the Turn
description: After the Turn is an immersive, atmospheric, survival horror game, with a story. Developed with Unreal Engine 5.

name: Kilager
description: After WWIII, nuclear and biochemical weapons devastated most of the planet. But humanity survived, and survivors formed KILAGER, a city nurturing the last civilization 70 years later. Unfortunately, humans cannot escape their nature...

name: Antkeep
description: A 2D ant tower defense strategy game, upgrade the ants' abilities to let them spread out and prevent the invasion of red fire ants.

name: Clomper
description: Drive your mechnical ladybird across a procedural hellscape by building pipes to power machines with steam. Explore from inside the submarine-like Clomper: collecting resources, completing quests and repairing damage. Go solo or with a friend with co-op multiplayer.

name: IT Hell
description: You are dead. Welcome to the IT Hell where you have to fight developers, critical bugs and your old equipment to make you way through it. Armed with your keyboard...and some guns, advance through different levels, upgrade your stats and reach the final boss!

name: Death Requiem
description: Death Requiem is a survival fantasy game. You'll explore the dungeon and gothic environment to experience the grandeur of architecture. The rift in the universe has opened and get ready to fight against constant stream of enemies using your strategy and skill combination.

name: Flayl
description: Flayl is a raid based survival extraction looter shooter with physics, built in Unreal Engine 5. Setup your gear, join a raid, fight for your life against up to 50-100 other players & Kovaak's wildlife using weapons, skills/abilities, physics, & do your best to stay alive in deadly weather.

name: Class of '09: The Re-Up
description: The rejection sim returns! Explore a slice of chaotic life in late 2000's American high school as you assume the role of Nicole once again. A 100% fully voiced VN presenting as the most culturally accurate period piece in the history of gaming.

name: Forty Foes
description: Pugilists prepare, The battle is about to begin...Forty Foes is a side-scrolling action adventure Beat 'em up in the style of classics like Double Dragon Battle Toads and Turtles in Time.

name: Helping Ani
description: Helping Ani is an psychological-horror RPG game, where you play as Hajime, a boy who has to take something to his girlfriend, Ani. But be careful, the forest will be full of strange and curious foes!

name: Tenko
description: Step into a world above the clouds as you assume the role of Rina Seiko, a former revolutionary warrior... and the infamous "White Demon" of legend who once made blood rain. Can she make amends with her past... or will her "Hitokiri" persona surface and lead the skies to ruin?

name: Space Saga
description: Space Saga is a universe in which you can control your own ship, travel on it and expand your possessions. You have to make difficult decisions, act on the world stage and create the world with your own hands. What choice will you make?

name: Momatron
description: Enemies have landed on your planet and brought a Big Bomb with them, which they intend to use to destroy your planet. Your task is to stop them!

name: Champion Shift
description: Unleash mythic heroes and their mighty vehicles in this thrilling co-op action roguelike. Seamlessly shift into car form, create builds with unique abilities, and battle endless enemies to stop the evil Dominion. Rev through high-octane missions, conquer epic bosses, and become an absolute legend!

name: Too Many Sheep
description: Too Many Sheep might be the ultimate sheep herding game. Work together with up to 4 players navigating challenging courses or compete with each other to herd your sheep the fastest. Too Many Sheep offers fun for players of all levels. Will you collaborate or compete? Play Too Many Sheep to find out!

name: Topple the Tower
description: Topple the Tower is a rouge-like bullet hell where you travel from room to room, slowly ascending the tower. Spacetime distorts inside it and it is teeming with strange creatures, hellbent on turning you into their dinner. The tower must go down.

name: Unknown Memoirs: The Rental
description: "Unknown Memoirs" is a short horror game series focusing on distressing tales of horror. "The Rental" centers on the main character moving into a rental that they found online. Little do they know of the horrors that await them.

name: Prophecy Island
description: Prophecy Island is a randomly generated open world action rpg. As the player you get the opportunity to start an entirely new adventure every playthrough, with a remixed main storyline, generated side-quest lines, a new island, new dungeons and so much more.

name: The Hostel: Night Terrors
description: In this game, you will find yourself in a hostel in the middle of a mysterious forest. You will discover terrifying and mysterious things, from murders to challenging puzzles. Use your skills to uncover the hidden secrets in the hostel. Get ready for an exciting and hair-raising experience!

name: The Black Door
description: The Black Door is a short and sweet horror point and click game. Players take on the role of a nameless protagonist who finds themselves trapped in a mysterious and sinister location. With a new take on the genre, utilizing new technology to allow a deeper more rich environmental exploration.

name: The Books Tale: A Hop Adventure
description: The Books Tale: A Hop Adventure is a game where you help Verbum save a library from creatures that threaten the interdimensional knowledge books. Overcome levels in a world made of blocks and explore unimaginable worlds to gather the energy necessary to purify them.

name: Paths of Fight: Samurai
description: Plan your moves, slash your enemies, and finish them with powerful combos. Find the correct fighting sequence and slash your enemies in this action puzzle game themed in japan feudal era.

name: Crown of Light
description: Beatrice has trained her whole life for this day, even if she never imagined it would really come. Brave, naive and determined, she will face the trials of her life to fulfill her destiny.

name: Dojo Assault
description: A scientific experiment to create the ultimate modern samurai is taking place ! Battle to create the unsurpassed warrior ninja assassin in the cloning dojo! Cut, stab and shoot your way to shinobi excellence !

name: Ketamina
description: "Ketamine" is a First-Person game in which you need to uncover why you woke up without any memory in an apparently unremarkable apartment, until you discover the secrets of the resident and consider whether you really want to stay or leave.

name: Chicken Tricks
description: Peck, dodge and shoot your way through endless waves of enemies. Upgrade your Chick and prove you have what is needed to avoid being turned into fried chicken.

name: Abyssal
description: Dive into "Abyssal," a deep-sea horror game where you pilot a cutting-edge diving suit. Brave the abyss, confront fears, gather resources, and unravel hidden secrets in a haunting, immersive world.

name: Rite as Rain
description: Open world rpg puzzle game with turn based combat

name: Twilight Struggle: Red Sea
description: Answer the summons of the trumpets and bear the burden of the Twilight Struggle. Set during the ideological tension of the Cold War, Twilight Struggle: Red Sea places the United States and the Soviet Union at odds in the Horn of Africa. Every choice you make will impact the balance of power.

name: Asura's Trial
description: Learn new skills based on simple key combinations in this easy to learn, hard to master adventure RPG. Combine over 100 different skills from 5 diverse classes to create an unbeatable combination and reclaim your body by finishing Asura's Trial.

name: Mirth Island
description: You're about to embark on an epic adventure with a young duck who's tired of feeling sad all the time. He's packed his bags, set sail on a rickety boat, and is headed straight for Mirth Island - a place where happiness is said to grow wild like daisies!

name: Hexagon Survivors
description: Is a game that is not for the faint of heart. With its challenging difficulty level, players will need to be on their toes at all times. Those who are up for the challenge, Hexagon Survivors offers a thrilling, cyberpunk-inspired adventure that is sure to keep players engaged for hours on end.

name: A Heroine Story
description: When a wizard comes to the village to help Victoria against a magical entity, things take a turn for the unexpected and the young mayor will have to make a decision that will change her life forever.

name: Mayor May Knott
description: A creepy-cozy 3D adventure, about a shy girl who accidentally becomes mayor of a haunted ghost town.

name: Interlopers
description: Interlopers is a solo-developed FPS inspired by retro classics. Wield big guns, shoot hordes of enemy robots, and explore hand-crafted levels set on multiple alien worlds.

name: J-Town: A Visual Novel
description: A friendly crash course in Japanese American history, culture, and community! Inspired by the real stories of the three historic Japantowns of California: San Francisco, San Jose, and Los Angeles's Little Tokyo.

name: The Cursed Amulet
description: Enter a mysterious cave and put your puzzle-solving skills to the test. Explore the depths of the cave, search for clues, and solve challenging puzzles that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Star Quest
description: Star Quest is a third person single player game that integrates space exploration, flight driving, action puzzle solving, and gunfight shooting. The game is developed with Unreal Engine 5 . In the vast universe, you can start this exciting journey by driving your own spaceship.

name: Titor's Time Traveling Tale
description: Step into the shoes of a medieval physicist studying the theory of time travel in "Titor's Time Traveling Tales," the VR escape room game. While conducting experiments on a strange artifact, you accidentally activate it and find yourself transported to a server room in the distant future.

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Dropout!
description: Meet a diverse cast of 9 cute crossdressing characters as they challenge you in block-sliding puzzle action! Score points to unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Starshapes
description: Uncover new constellations and re-light the stars by connecting colorful Starshapes. Create unique and beautiful solutions to abstract three-dimensional puzzles and experience the calm of outer space.

name: Jets A Blazin'
description: An exploration game with jetpacks and a variety of guns, all in the stunning immersive world of VR! Chill, low stakes, and semi-destructive, it's the perfect game for stress relief and satisfying your inner child.

name: Bloody Doctor
description: Bloody Doctor is an Action RPG. Control a Doctor facing an epidemic by extracting organs. Fight ennemies and operate on corpses at your lab. Explore an old Steampunk Paris during a strange period.

name: Master of Luna
description: Master of Luna is a turn-based 4x strategy game in a fantasy world with powerful magic and all kinds of mystical creatures. It has tactical battles, cozy pixel art, and a mildly melancholic atmosphere.

name: Cruel Reality: A Horrible Dream
description: Horrible Dream - first of the Cruel Reality trilogy, a visual novel with elements of psychological horror.

name: Turning
description: Sin descripción

name: Fugitive
description: A digital implementation of the board game.

name: Camplandia
description: Build and manage a thriving summer camp. Hire staff and provide activities for campers as you grow your revenue and reputation. Unlock new facilities and camp activities to bring your dream camp to life in this immersive simulation.

name: Dungeon Seekers
description: Dungeon Seekers is a multiplayer VR dungeon adventure RPG featuring drop-in cooperative play, realistic physic interactions, engaging combat and climbing mechanics. Team up with your friends to fight monsters, loot treasures and upgrade & customize your equipment.

name: Music Summoner
description: Music-themed bullet-hell shooting for beginners to advanced users

name: Age of Fear: Total
description: This rich fantasy world loved by fans for its deep tactics and epic stories is due to become that much larger once the upcoming Ratmen enter the fold, bringing with it a brand new, meaty mainline quest for fans to battle through. But like any good adventure, it's never really over!

name: Mop of the Dead
description: Mop of the Dead is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. Our cleaning competitors are stealing our customers. Well, let's steal their household products. Run, scream and don't get caught by the revengeful janitor with his big mop of death!

name: Escaping Atlantis
description: Escaping Atlantis is a roguelite deckbuilder where all your cards are unique Atlanteans. Get to know them, direct them in tactical battles and strengthen your team to face bigger challenges, all with the hope of.. Escaping Atlantis!

name: Animal Kostume
description: No talk, compadre. It's Animal Kostume time! Follow kroc-boy in his path to overcome a series of difficult levels in this hardcore 2D platformer with a lot of enemies, bullets and surprises.

name: Sea Chronicles
description: Sea Chronicles - is a first person comedy-adventure game where you're lost at sea. You try to find a way back home, but start to notice that you might not be alone on the ship. Is someone sabotaging your escape, or are you going insane?

name: Illegal Excavation
description: Welcome to the exciting journey. In order to stand up, you will witness the adventures he lived in his mysterious treasures. You will be challenged! Getting caught in booby traps or your enemies will be a real journey where you must find their treasures and Discover their mysteries by solving clues.

name: Hundred Acre Wood
description: Explore and survive a twisted Hundred Acre Wood while being hunted by an old childhood friend, Winnie-the-Pooh. Rescue Christopher Robin with the help of Eldritch Beasts that were once familiar faces. Discover what took place and has changed a once beautiful land into something dark and dangerous.

name: Porpetha
description: An action, adventure and musical game. Perfect for hanging out and having fun.

name: Enlightened
description: Enlightened is a survival horror game with strong focus on puzzle solving. Explore the hotel in which you woke up, find clues about what happened, solve puzzles and find a way out, while surviving horrors that awaits you there.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Official Map Extension
description: Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Map Extension DLC is free and extends the "Angel Shores" map with a huge new area. The mountainous nature reserve offers numerous new campaign missions, new stops, and more!

name: Ground of Aces
description: The base building game that lets you take command of a remote air base of workers and pilots during World War II.

name: Noitapeli
description: First person horror game, you have a special watch in your hand which shows the distance to the noita. Find a bottle which noita needs and bring it back. Use gun, collect mushrooms and avoid noita to find the bottle.

name: NBF0
description: A simple, fun, FPS where you must advance through waves of evil robots. Use your energy weapons to fight them and escape to freedom!

name: Scramble All Fighters
description: Amazing graphics. Countless different units. An addictive Battle Pass. We have none of those things. Just one carrier and as many tiny fighters as you can muster to hold back hordes of enemy fighters and bombers. Victory is not enough - you may win the battle, but still lose the war!

name: Little Ghosthunter
description: Uncover the stories behind a family of ghosts to free them from the confines of their own house, as you search for a way to summon your best friend from the afterlife.

name: Grave Robber
description: Grave Robber is a challenging and addictive game with pixel-art aesthetics and retro-inspired soundtrack. A true homage to the classic arcade games. But don't be fooled by its charming appearance - this game is a true test of your skill, requiring laser-sharp focus and split-second decision-making.

name: Tornado: Research and Rescue
description: Get ready for non-stop action with Tornado: Research and Rescue! Chase down violent tornadoes using 90's style doppler radar, deploy scientific probes, and earn money to upgrade your equipment. Enjoy a unique experience with procedurally generated tornadoes and scenarios!

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Ebusco Bus Pack
description: A new bus manufacturer just appeared! Ebusco is here to stay and for you to drive around Angel Shores and Seaside Valley. The Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Ebusco Bus Pack includes three new buses as well as six new interior designs.

name: DragonShift
description: Embark on an epic adventure with DragonShift, a unique turn-based Fantasy-Adventure-RPG with hundreds of dungeons to explore, lots of puzzles, decision-driven campaigns and fun online modes that let you measure your skills with players from around the world.

name: Escape from Garbage House
description: Cleaners undertake the cleanup with a physical operation that involves dumping trash with both hands. Depending on your attitude toward the job, you may get crows or police visits Clean the house through conversation!

name: Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe
description: Experience the challenges and triumphs of leading a tribe in Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe. Explore, mine, hunt, and build your way to success. Customizable buildings, resource management, and population growth make every playthrough unique.

name: Runaway Farm
description: Runaway to Skipping Rock and reclaim your Grandma’s farm. You’re going to need to get crops in the ground, harvest and sell lumber, make a fishing pole and catch some fresh fish, and sell weekly at the Farmers Market!

name: Blackheart
description: Blackheart is a 2D single-player dark fantasy action RPG centred around the royal Blackheart family and the internal conflicts that are consuming them from the inside out.

name: Liminal Lands
description: Liminal Lands is a poetic journey through a hybrid reality where sun, salt, wind, water algae and bacteria collide. Based on fieldwork from the salt marshes of southern France, the artwork explores otherwise unseen macro- and microscopic ecosystems of the wetlands.

name: Limos' Lair
description: In this Zelda-like / Metroidvania game, you will explore the lair of a long-gone mythical creature and unravel its mysteries. Consume enemies to gain their abilities, use your frog-like tongue to grapple and fight, explore the land, solve puzzles, find secrets, and complete challenges.

name: Hill Dig: The Boring Adventure
description: Hill Dig is a digging adventure game where you will have to explore a world full of exciting and challenging puzzles in a variety of different biomes with a custom built vehicule. Explore a 2D voxel world, solve more than a hundred puzzles, improve your vehicule and go always deeper.

name: Beyond the Plastic Wall
description: Beyond the Plastic Wall is an atmosphere dense narrative exploration of isolation, love and the search for human connection set in the shadow of an ageless city.

name: Murder at the House
description: 11 people trapped in an old abandoned house together. 8 Innocents. One Detective. One Murderer. You are either the murderer or detective. You must interrogate suspects and find clues in order to solve the mystery, before it is too late.

name: Missing Critters
description: Embark on a delightful adventure and seek out the Missing Critters hidden within intricate cartoon scenes, with a soothing lo-fi soundtrack and no time limits - just relax and unwind. Enjoy a captivating experience that will provide fresh challenges, as each play-through is unique.

name: AngelStrike
description: AngelStrike is an exciting 2D side-scrolling shoot'em'up with handmade pixel-art and a variety of action-packed missions. Play solo or local co-op with friends to rescue refugees, stealthily deliver supplies, escort your allies, and take down hordes of machines in 40 levels across 5 different areas!

name: Tiny Frightened
description: Tiny Frightened: a thrilling multiplayer game where you and your friends become voodoo dolls in a tiny and terrifying world, evading an evil pursuer. Help your friends and sew their eyes back on... and their eyes are buttons! Find valves to open the exit and escape.

name: Villaging
description: Villaging is a simple game of strategy where you reign on a kingdom and you need to manage your ressources and your inhabitant .But you will also get threat from other kingdom so you will need to make an army to fight against them .

name: Mogrimera: Disciple of Order
description: Explore across the land and create your very own grimera!

name: HeadHorse Legacy
description: The most diabolical killer from smartphones is now on Steam. HeadHorse is your captor and you have a single mission, escape. He is a very intelligent killer with an unmatchable desire for blood is following every single one of your moves, every step, every glimpse of hope you have of escaping, every instant getting closer to his objective, you!

name: Heroes Quest Survival
description: Embark on an exciting journey in Heroes Quest Survival. Unite with fellow heroes to liberate lands from monstrous orcs and zombies. Master the art of swordplay and sorcery to rescue innocent lives in this thrilling quest.

name: Combat Medic
description: Combat Medic is a top-down 2D game where you play as a combat medic. Traverse the battlefield avoiding the hale of incoming enemy fire, make use of your medical tools and use your knowledge to save the lives of fallen soldiers before they succumb to one of their many possible injuries.

name: Root Connections
description: Digging deep into the root of his world, you play as the hallucinations of a man struggling with psychotic depression. Puzzling your way through the darkness of alcoholism and the fear of losing loved ones, it is up to you to root connect this man’s life back together again!

name: Giant Defense
description: The most challenging tower defense game to date, real-time control 3D perspective, multiple enemy intelligent attack routes! 8 types of towers, each with unique special abilities.25 challenging levels to conquer!Over 10 powerful enemies to challenge your command abilities.

name: Eyes of War
description: Eyes of War is a real-time strategy game set in the medieval era, offering both single-player and multiplayer experiences where you can control every unit in character mode. Build your castle, lead your army, and dominate the map. Eyes of War invites you to epic battles of the medieval era!

name: Nimrods: GunCraft Survivor
description: Assemble a limitless arsenal in this survive-em-up roguelite shooter. As a Gun Manufacturer's testing force, your mission is simple: test the latest gun tech and scavenge alien planets. Collect insane weapon parts to invent crazy guns that slay thousands. You may not survive, but your guns will!

name: Emergency
description: Save lives – be a hero! Join forces against the chaos in the newest title of the award-winning Emergency series. Take up your shift as incident commander and coordinate with other players to fight fires, arrest gangsters and rescue injured civilians. Your city needs you!

name: Sakeworld
description:
Welcome to Sakeworld.
Treat the ladies nice and you will be rewarded.
Run and gun to get those weapons and ammo or you're done!
Punch your way out of a crowd and then empty your clip.
Throw a grenade or use a special attack to help keep a cool and level head.
Use the foreground and background to your advantage or you will get smoked.
Beat em up, but be smart, the Mysterious Dr Sake awaits.
Sakeworld is an alternate dimension, so you know things are about to get weird.
Only you can set things right and clean up these streets!

name: Destiny Summoner
description:
Destiny Summoner, the latest Idle strategy RPG from DH Games, is coming to your phone!
Start your adventure of redemption in the shattered world of Destiny Summoner!
Lead your team of heroes venture deep into a continent of mystery and save the world from demons and darkness.

name: Coffee Roaster
description: A digital implementation of the bag-building solo board game. Players "roast" their beans over several rounds by assembling and modifying a pool of coffee bean tokens of different values, trying to draw the right balance for the type of roast.

name: Unioverse Proving Grounds
description: Unioverse Proving Grounds is a third-person shooter, speedrun mode within our alpha Hero Viewer. Sprint, shoot, slash through fun obstacles and top the weekly leaderboard for rewards.

name: Insect Wars
description: Insect Wars is a real-time strategy game where you lead an army of insects. Collect resources, build your colony, and destroy the enemy's to win. Scout the enemy, master different unit types and technologies, and face off in 1v1 or team-up against the AI.

name: Sentinent Steel
description: Sentinent Steel is a fast-paced 2.5D action-platformer for up to two players. Fight back against a rogue Artificial Intelligence, avoiding the growths of its synthetic infection, and destroying its fearsome machines.

name: The Dark Pursuer
description: You find yourself locked up alone in an abandoned place, but something is nearby, something dark and dangerous. Try to look for ways to get out of there before you can no longer...

name: The Source
description: A sci-fi visual novel where our main heroes journey through time and discover the mysteries of their world.

name: The Night of the Inquisitor
description: Uncover the mystery behind a cursed rosary in this chilling survival horror game. Evade the Inquisitor, solve puzzles, and interact with NPCs to collect all the pieces of the rosary and break the curse. Can you save Emilia and her mother before it's too late?

name: Precision of Insight
description: 2D puzzle platformer with a lot of puzzles that will push your intelligence and problem-solving skills to the limit.

name: A Pretty Broken Adventure
description: A PRETTY BROKEN ADVENTURE is a solo-developed, hand-drawn classic point-and-click adventure game. Embark on a crazy journey into a vibrant fantasy world where anything seems possible - except getting a decent cup of coffee - oh.... and reuniting with your friends to finally return home.

name: Knights of the Throne
description: Lasha is the leader of the Knights, a young woman of honor and strength. Deadly with a blade and pure in her heart, she will volunteer to take on a perilous path to protect the kingdom from an army of enemies never seen before.

name: A Night in Omar's Burger
description: Work together, trust no one! Get ready for a night of burger flipping and zombie slaying in A Night In Omar's Burger! With waves of undead attackers and a traitor in your midst, can you and your friends survive until morning? Fight for your survival in this 4-8 person multiplayer game.

name: Crimson Hollow
description: Crimson Hollow is a cozy fantasy game set in a magical town, kept secret from the outside world. In this game, you will play as a hero who discovers this mysterious village inhabited by magical villagers.

name: Plantsportation
description: Install operational modules on your rocket and program them to deliver plants to the target.

name: FlyBye
description: "FlyBye" is an emotional adventure game where you play as Harold, a WW1 veteran fulfilling his wife's final wish. Take her ashes on a journey across a stunning world, encountering old memories and creating new ones. Explore, overcome challenges, and discover the true meaning of life and love.

name: Chess!
description: Chess! an immersive 3d chess game built with Unreal Engine 5 and seamlessly integrated with the popular online platform, Lichess. Players can challenge advanced AI, compete against millions of other players in ranked matchmaking, delve into offline chess puzzles, and much more!

name: Sniper Killer
description: Eliminate your victims as a serial killer dubbed ‘The Sniper Killer’. Terrorize the city with your keen eye and thirst for blood while staying one step ahead of a detective hell bent on bringing you to justice.

name: Bread or Dead
description: Playing as a peanut butter and jelly-obsessed professional exterminator, you travel across the world taking care of nasty undead infestations. Make some serious cash to reach your goal of eating as many peanut butter and jelly sandwiches as possible, and down it all with a glass of chocolate milk.

name: Pocket Puzzle
description: A puzzle game about fix factory tracks and assembling a pocket game.

name: Underwater Cities
description: The official digital port of the tabletop game which won 2019 Diamant d’Or – top expert strategy game. This digital version adds online multiplayer and AI opponents.

name: HotWire VR
description: Complete every wire as fast as you can without touching them!

name: 9th Land
description: 9th Land is a family co-op multiplayer action-adventure game set in a fantasy world with elements of community simulation.

name: The Two Moons
description: A Comedy/Walking Simulator RPG that follows a 4th-wall breaking main character who knows he is in a crappy RPG maker game and wants no part of it, but he is forced into being the main character by a series of infinite loop Yes/No choices where No isn't a real option. Chaos ensues in this wacky game.

name: Cream Soda Club
description: Cream Soda Club is a new word in the tycoon genre. Become a nightclub manager. Throw parties with Cream Soda. Decorate the dance floor, jazz up your club, unlock new tracks. Make yourself into the best event manager in the virtual world!

name: Anisto
description: A vessel of humanity's last hope must forge a new home planet by excavating ore from asteroids, refining alloys, and fending off rival Harvesters. A "ship shooter" without bullets or weapons, Anisto rethinks the genre with unique tools and scenarios that test decision making, not just reflexes.

name: Museum No.9
description: Massive artifact collection! Build your museum with extreme freedom! Visitor revenue depends on your route design, and whether you can achieve perfect profits is entirely up to you! Enjoy light rogue-style adventure exploration, and use different skill combinations to battle monsters every time!

name: Dynasty Detective
description: DynastyDetective is a visual Nobel-style mystery story game set in the fictional Joseon Dynasty where monsters appear.

name: Finding Fate
description: A hidden object game following the journalist Fate, in her quest to uncover the truth and her own past.

name: Groob
description: Embark on a challenging roguelike adventure, mastering tactical deck-building and intricate strategies as you explore unknown dungeons. Build your powerful deck, adapt to changing enemies, and utilize cards and items for victory.

name: Occult Club: Gathering Fo(u)r Fatal Stories
description: A horror mystery adventure game with ghost story elements. They say if three people gather at 4:00 AM on April 4th and finish telling three horror stories, a fourth participant—the evil spirit in the story—will appear. You attend such a gathering, but the initiator seems to be up to something...

name: RogueStone 2: Open World
description: Experience the Ultimate Role-Playing Game with RogueStone 2: Open World. Explore the depths of the Core, uncover the secrets of the Gurus, and discover the 9 Meta Orbs to become the Master of this world. Will you overcome the challenges and vanquish the Consuming Darkness?

name: Crazy The Clown's Balloon Animal Massacre
description: Crazy told them all, more than once. He told them *not* to setup a balloon animal factory at the circus... but no...nobody would listen. Within days the equipment went out of control due to AI software attempting to take over the world and the Circus became an immediate disaster.

name: Isegyemeideu
description: Mansion Made Love Simulation Game

name: Disney Speedstorm: Deluxe Founder's Pack
description: Take the track by storm with the Deluxe Founder's Pack!

name: Void Warden
description: Void Warden is a unique mix of Turn-Based Combat and Tower Defence. Build a powerful roster of guardians from the last survivors of a doomed world. Customise and co-ordinate your party in order to defend against apocalyptic horrors. Can you hold back the darkness?

name: Cargo Delivery
description: In the game, you become a driver of a car that carries various goods to remote villages, located in snowy areas.

name: Bewitched Balls
description: Bewitched Balls is partly a "color matching" like puzzle game and partly a turn-based combat game set in a world of magic and fantasy where your goal is to defuse six evil gems and finally fight against a powerful witch.

name: Text Twist Classic
description: Get ready for some word-finding fun game in Text Twist Classic! Around 1800 different words to learn! Look at the jumbled letters and find all the word combinations. Over 8000 levels. Two different modes to play: Untimed and Timed.

name: Starship 43
description: Immerse yourself in this intense virtual reality indie sci-fi FPS action game. Explore Starship 43, fight hostile enemies, solve puzzles, and overcome obstacles to restore communication with Earth. Experience the isolation and danger of space as you uncover the station's secrets.

name: Suzerain: Kingdom of Rizia
description: Experience the rulership of a new country in the Suzerain Universe with The Kingdom of Rizia DLC – the first expansion of the critically-acclaimed political role-playing game. As King Romus Toras explore the unique geopolitical and internal conflicts of the Kingdom of Rizia.
